God a kabi ra lalaaun ma i taari kaai karom Natuna, ia kaai a kabi ra lalaaun.
God i taar taa a dekdek taana kupi in naagagon a taara mai, kabina maa ia a Natu ra Muaana.
Koku muaat kakaian u ra pirpir mi. A pakaana bung in waan paat, baa diat raap baa diat inep u ra kum tung na minaat diat a walangoro in ingaana.
Diat a waan paat ko ra kum tung na minaat. Diat baa diat aa paam taa a koina mangamangaan diat a tur ko ra minaat kup a lalaaun takum. Ma diat kaai baa diat aa paam taa aakaina mangamangaan, diat a tur ko ra minaat kup a winirua takum.”
Iesu i pirpir utbaai karom a kum te Iudaia, i piri naa, “Pa iaau paam biaa ku ta utnaa u ra nung nemnem, iaau naagagon welaar ma ra utnaa iaau walangoroi. Ma anung naagagon i takado, maa pa iaau mur a nuknuking, iaau murmur ut a nuknukin ia baa i tula wa iaau urin.
Baa iaau wewapua balet ut un iaau, anung wewapua pa in mawaat.
Raa ingen ut i wewapua un iaau, ma iaau nunurai naa anuna wewapua un iaau i lingtatuna aakit.
“Muaat tula wa raa taara karom Ioaanes a Tena Baapitaaiso, ma i wapua diat u ra lingtatuna.
Pa iaau iba kup ta taara baa diat a wewapua un iaau, iaku iaau piri lenbi kupi din walaaun muaat.
Ioaanes i welaar ma ra laam, baa i kup ma i kaapakaapa, ma muaat gaaia baa muaat babo kinalik paa ku u ra kaapakaapaina.
“Iaku a wewapua kaapa un iaau i ngaala taa ra wewapua kaapa anun Ioaanes. A kum utnaa baa iaau laana paami, diat wewapua kaapa un iaau naa Tamaang i tula wa iaau, maa a kum pinapaam maa, Tamaang i taar ta diat taang kupi ang paami.
Ma Tamaang, ia baa i tula wa iaau urin, ia wewapua kaapa taau un iaau. Pa muaat walangoro in ingaana, ma pa muaat babo taa kaai a mataana.
Ma pa muaat nuk akoto anuna pirpir u ra balaamuaat, kabina maa pa muaat nurnur un ia baa di tula wai urin.
Muaat lukluk ut a Buk Taabu, kabina maa muaat nuki naa muaat a lo a lalaaun takum uni. Iaku a Buk Taabu kaai i wewapua ut un iaau!
Iaku maa pa muaat nem na waan karom iaau kupi muaat a lo a lalaaun.
“Pa iaau iba kup a pir walaawa anu ra taara karom iaau.
Maa iaau nunura muaat ut, baa pa muaat maari God u ra balaamuaat.
Iaau waan paat u ra iaan Tamaang, ma pa muaat gaaia pa iaau. Iaku baa te ingen in waan paat ma ra iaana ut, io, muaat a gaaia paai.
Muaat, muaat nemnem aakiti kupi a taara diat a pir walaawa pa muaat. Baa lenmaa, muaat a nurnur lelawaai? Maa pa muaat ngaraa kup a pir walaawa anun God karom muaat, God ia baa raa ot ku.
Koku muaat nuki naa iaau maa ang takuna muaat karom Tamaang, pate. Moses baa muaat nurnur naa in waraaut muaat, ia ut maa in takuna muaat.
Baa muaat nurnur un Moses, gun muaat a nurnur utkaai un iaau, kabina maa ia i timtimu muga un iaau.
Iaku baa pa muaat nurnur u ra kum timtimu anun Moses, muaat a nurnur lelawaai u ra nung kum pirpir?”
Io, namur, Iesu i waan bolo u ra taai kikil Gaalilaia, baa di waatungi kaai naa a taai kikil Tiberiaas.
A ngaala na kor na taara diat murmuri, kabina baa diat aa babo taa a kum wakilang Iesu i paami, baa i walaangalaanga pa diat baa diat malaapaang.
Iesu i waan tato unaanga u ra taangaai ma diat ki ungaai ma ra nuna kum naat na wawer.
Ma a lukaara na waan likaai anu ra taara Iudaia ia marawaai.
Baa Iesu i babo kado, i babo paa a ngaala na kor na taara diat waan karomi. I piri taan Pilipo naa, “Daat a kul ta utnaa na winangaan awaai kupi daat a tabaara a kum taara mai mi?”
Iesu i piri lenmi kupi in walaar ku Pilipo. Ia ut ia nunura a utnaa baa in paami.
Pilipo i baalui naa, “Ta utnaa na winangaan baa din kul paai ma ta 200 na denaaria, pa in welaar ma diat, raaraa pulik ku maa diat a aani.”
Raa balet kon diat anuna kum naat na wawer, a iaana Aanderiaas, a tein Simon Petero, i piri taan Iesu naa,
“Raa naat muaana lik kuri i lo limnain bred ku baa di paami ko ra baali, ma ruina ian. Iaku maa in welaar ma ra kor na taara mi lelawaai?”
A wanua maa in wali raap ku, io, Iesu i tula anuna kum naat na wawer kupi diat a waki a taara matira. A kor na taara maa, a niluluk i ra in muaana ku i welaar ma 5,000.
Iesu i lo paa limnain bred, i waatung wakaak paa uni karom God, ma i palau a taara mai baa diat ki matira. Ma i palau diat kaai ma ra ian, welaar ma ra nundiat nemnem.
Baa diat aa maaur raap, i piri taa ra nuna kum naat na wawer naa, “Muaat a ung ungaai wakaak a utnaa raap diat aan kapo taai, kupi koku di baanaakaka a utnaa na winangaan.”
Io, diat ung ungaai raap paa a utnaa baa a taara diat aan kapo taai, ma diat wangaana ateng paa 12 kaa ko ra limnain bred maa.
Baa a taara diat babo a wakilang mi i paami, diat piri naa, “A lingtatuna aakit baa a muaana mi, ia a propet baa di piri naa in waan paat urin u ra rakrakaan buaal.”
Baa Iesu ia nunurai naa diat nem na waan karomi kupi diat a wowo paai kupi in king, io, i waan ingen paa kon diat unaanga nate un raa taangaai.
Baa ia tawiwibung a kum naat na wawer anun Iesu diat waan pari unakono kup a taai kikil.
Diat kaa taau u ra mon, ma diat turpaai kupi diat a waan bolo u ra taai kikil kup Kaapernaaum. Ia marum, ma Iesu pa i waan paat utbaai karom diat.
A dekdek na dadaip i waan paat ma a taai u ra taai kikil i top dekdek maut.
Baa diat aa walua welwelik, welaar duk ma lima na kilomita, diat babo paa Iesu i waan nate u ra taai kikil karom diat u ra mon. Ma diat burut aakit.
Iaku Iesu i piri taan diat naa, “Koku muaat burut, iaau ku mi.”
Ma diat gaaia paai kupi in kaa u ra mon. Io, diat pukaai maut u ra wanua baa diat waan kupi.
U ra bung namur, a kor na taara baa diat ki irong un raa papaara taai kikil, diat nunurai naa raa mon ot ku i ki matira. Diat nunurai naa a kum naat na wawer ku maa diat waan, Iesu ut pa i kaa ungaai ma diat. Diat ku diat waan taanga matira.
Namur raa kum mon taangirong Tiberiaas diat pukaai marawaai u ra wanua baa a Tadaaru i waatung wakaak u ra bred ma a kor na taara diat wangaan iaai.
Baa a kor na taara diat baboi baa Iesu ma ra nuna kum naat na wawer pa diat ki matira, diat kaa u ra kum mon, diat waan urong Kaapernaaum ma diat baat kup Iesu.
Baa a taara diat baat paa Iesu irong un raa papaara taai kikil, diat tiri naa, “Tena Wawer, naangaian ku maa u waan taau min?”
Iesu i baalu diat naa, “Iaau pir a lingtatuna taa muaat, wakir muaat baat kup iaau u ra kum wakilang baa iaau paami, pate. Muaat baat ku kup iaau kabina muaat aan a bred ma muaat maaur uni.
Koku muaat ongongor kup a utnaa na winangaan baa i marmareng ku. Muaat a ongongor kup a utnaa baa in taana takum kup a lalaaun namur, baa Natu ra Muaana in tabaara muaat mai. Maa God Tamaana ia wakilang taa Natuna naa i tur ungaai mai.”
Diat tiri naa, “Aawa maa miaat a paami kupi miaat a paam a pinapaam anun God?”
Iesu i baalu diat naa, “Bari ia a pinapaam anun God, baa muaat a nurnur un ia baa di tula wai urin.”
Ma diat tiri balet naa, “Aawa a wakilang un paami kupi miaat a baboi ma miaat a nurnur un ui uni? Aawa maa un paami?
A kum taptabumiaat taanga namuga diat aan a maana u ra bil na wanua, welaar ma di aa timu taai u ra Buk Taabu naa, ‘I tabaara diat ma ra bred taanginaanga u ra maawa ma diat aani.’”
Iesu i piri taan diat naa, “Iaau pir a lingtatuna taa muaat, wakir Moses maa i tabaara diat ma ra bred taanginaanga u ra maawa, Tamaang maa i tabaara diat. Ma mi i tabaara muaat ma ra bred lingtatuna taanginaanga u ra maawa.
Ia baa i waan pari taanginaanga u ra maawa, ia ut maa a bred anun God, baa i taar a lalaaun karom a taara raap u ra rakrakaan buaal.”
Diat piri taana naa, “Tadaaru, un tabaara miaat ma ra bred maa u ra kum bungbung raap.”
Iesu i baalu diat naa, “Iaau a bred na lalaaun. Baa te in waan karom iaau pa in molo, ma baa te in nurnur un iaau pa in maruk balet ma.
Iaau aa pir taai taa muaat naa muaat aa babo ta iaau, iaku pa muaat nurnur.
Diat raap baa Tamaang i taar ta diat taang, diat a waan karom iaau, ma te baa in waan karom iaau pang lu wai, painte mulu.
Maa iaau waan pari taanginaanga u ra maawa, wakir kupi ang murmur a nuknuking, pate, kupi ang murmur ut a nemnem anun Tamaang, ia baa i tula wa iaau urin.
Bari ia a nemnem anun Tamaang, ia baa i tula wa iaau urin, naa koku te kon diat baa ia taar ta diat taang in wirua. Ang watur raap pa diat balet ko ra minaat u ra tintinip na bung.
U ra nemnem anun Tamaang, diat raap baa diat babo kup Natuna ma diat nurnur uni, diat a lalaaun takum, ma iaau ang watur pa diat ko ra minaat u ra tintinip na bung.”
Raa kum te Iudaia diat pirpir mumumuk un Iesu, kabina maa i piri naa, “Iaau a bred baa i waan pari taanginaanga u ra maawa.”
Io, diat piri uni naa, “Iesu a natun Iosep ku. Daat nunura ku tamaana ma naana. Io, aawa kabina maa i piri naa i waan pari taanginaanga u ra maawa?”
Iesu i piri taan diat naa, “Koku muaat pirpir mumumuk.
Pain te in waan karom iaau, baa Tamaang, baa i tula wa iaau, pa i ben taai karom iaau, ma iaau ut ang watur paai ko ra minaat u ra tintinip na bung.
A kum propet diat aa timu taai lenbi, ‘God in wer diat raap.’ Io, diat raap baa diat walangoro Tamaang ma diat wawer koni, diat a waan karom iaau.
Pa te i babo taa Tamaang, ia ut baa i waan paa kon God, i babo taa Tamaana.
Iaau pir a lingtatuna taa muaat mi, ia baa i nurnur un iaau, ia lo a lalaaun takum.
“Iaau a bred na lalaaun.
A kum taptabumuaat taanga namuga diat aan a maana u ra bil na wanua, ma diat aa maat.
Iaku a bred mi i waan taanginaanga u ra maawa, baa te in aani, pa in maat.
Iaau a bred a lalaaunina, baa i waan pari taanginaanga u ra maawa. Baa te i wangaan ko ra bred mi, in lalaaun takum. Maia, a bred baa ang wetabaar mai, ia a paning. Iaau taari kupi a taara u ra rakrakaan buaal diat a lalaaun uni.”
Raa kum te Iudaia diat kaankaan wetwetalaai, ma diat piri naa, “A muaana mi in tabaara lelawaai daat ma ra panina kupi daat a aani?”
Io, Iesu i piri taan diat, “Iaau pir a lingtatuna taa muaat, baa pa muaat a aan a pani ra Natu ra Muaana ma pa muaat a inim a gaapina, pa ta lalaaun lingtatuna in ki un muaat.
Ia baa i aan a paning ma i inim a gaaping, ia lo a lalaaun takum, ma iaau ang watur paai ko ra minaat u ra tintinip na bung.
Maa a paning ia a utnaa na winangaan lingtatuna, ma a gaaping ia a palaa na ininim lingtatuna.
Ia baa i aan a paning ma i inim a gaaping, in lalaaun un iaau, ma iaau ang lalaaun uni.
Tamaang baa i kabina u ra lalaaun i tula wa iaau, ma i tabaara iaau ma ra lalaaun. Lenkaai maa karom ia baa i aan a paning, iaau ang tabaarai ma ra lalaaun.
Bi ia a bred baa i waan taanginaanga u ra maawa, wakir i welaar ma raa baa a kum taptabundaat taanga namuga diat aani, ma diat aa maat. Baa te in wangaan ko ra bred mi, in lalaaun takum.”
Iesu i pir a kum pirpir mi baa i wer a taara u ra ruma na lotu irong Kaapernaaum.
Mongoro ko ra nuna taara na wawer baa diat walangoro a kum pirpir mi diat piri naa, “A wawer mi i dekdek aakit, woi maa in gaaia kupi?”
Iesu i nunurai naa anuna taara na wawer diat pirpir mumumuk uni. I tiri diat naa, “Lelawaai, a pirpir mi pa i koina karom muaat?
In papet lelawaai karom muaat baa muaat a babo Natu ra Muaana in waan talili balet unaanga kup a taamaan baa namuga ia ki paa iaai?
A Nion, ia maa i taar a lalaaun. A dekdek i ra pani ra muaana pa ta utnaa i gaa uni. A kum pirpir baa iaau piri taa muaat, i Nion ma i lalaaun.
Iaku raa taara kon muaat pa diat nurnur.” Iesu ia nunura muga wa diat baa pa diat a nurnur uni, ma ia kaai baa in wagu taai.
Ma i piri kaai naa, “Bi ia a kabina baa iaau piri taa muaat naa pa te in waan karom iaau, baa Tamaang pa i taar taa a dekdek taana, kupi in murmur iaau.”
Io, mongoro kon diat anuna taara na wawer diat waan talili paa koni, ma pa diat murmuri ma.
Iesu i piri taa ra nuna 12 naat na wawer naa, “Lelawaai, muaat kaai, muaat nemi ma naa muaat a waan talili paa kon iaau?”
Simon Petero i baalui lenbi, “Tadaaru, miaat a waan ma karom woi? Maa anum ku a kum pirpir na lalaaun takum.
Miaat aa nurnur ma miaat nunurai naa ui a Tena Gomgom anun God.”
Iesu i piri taan diat naa, “Iaau aa pilak pa muaat a 12, naka? Iaku raa kon muaat a tabaraan ku!”
I pirpir un Iudaas, natun Simon Iskaariot, ia raa ko ra 12 naat na wawer, ia baa in wagu taa ut Iesu.
Io, namur Iesu i waan taltalili u ra kum taamtaamaan irong Gaalilaia. Pa i nem na waan taltalili irong u ra papaar Iudaia, kabina raa kum te Iudaia diat nem na aak dokoi.
A bung na lotu anu ra taara Iudaia baa di waatungi ma a lukaara na palpalip, i marawaai.
Io, a kum tatein Iesu diat piri taana naa, “I koina kupi un waan taanga min ma un waan urong Iudaia baa anum taara na wawer diat a babo a kum utnaa na kakaian baa un paami.
Pa te i laana paam ino a kum utnaa, baa i nemi kupi a taara diat a nunurai. Baa u laana paam a kum utnaa mi, i koina baa un paam apuaanai kupi a taara u ra rakrakaan buaal raap diat a nunura ui!”
A kum tatena liklik diat pirpir lenmi, kabina maa diat kaai pa diat nurnur uni.
Iesu i piri taan diat naa, “Anung pakaana bung pa i ot utbaai, iaku karom muaat, anumuaat kum pakpakaana bung i laangalaanga ku.
A taara u ra rakrakaan buaal pa diat milikuaana muaat un ta utnaa, iaku diat milikuaana iaau, maa kabina iaau wapua diat u ra nundiat kum aakaina mangamangaan.
Muaat, muaat a waan unaanga u ra lukaara. Pang waan gagaa kup a lukaara mi, maa anung pakaana bung pa i ot utbaai.”
Baa ia pirpir taau, io, i ki okot irong Gaalilaia.
Baa a kum tatein Iesu diat aa waan kup a lukaara, io, namur Iesu i murmur diat, iaku pa i pet waiaa ia karom a taara. I waan ino waanwaan ku.
Raa kum te Iudaia diat baat kup Iesu u ra lukaara, diat wetiri naa, “A muaana mi kuraa ia awaai?”
Mongoro na taara diat pirpir ino un Iesu. Raa taara diat piri uni naa, “Ia a koina muaana,” ma raa taara diat piri naa, “Pate, i ben araara a taara.”
Ma pa te i pirpir baara uni, kabina maa diat burutaana raa kum taara Iudaia.
Baa diat aa ki naliwan u ra kum bungbung na lukaara, Iesu i turpaai kupi in wer a taara u ra ruma na wetabaar.
Raa kum te Iudaia diat kakaian aakit ma diat piri naa, “A muaana mi i nunura lelawaai a kum manaana mi? Maa pa i wawer paa.”
Iesu i baalu diat naa, “A wawer mi iaau wawer mai, wakir anung, anun ia baa i tula wa iaau urin.
Baa te i nem na murmur a nemnem anun God, in nunura lelei, baa anung wawer mi kon God, baa ko ra nuknuking ku.
Te baa i pirpir ku ko ra nuknukina, i nemi ku kupi din nuk angaala paai. Iaku ia baa i nemi kupi din nuk angaala paa God baa i tula wai urin, ia maa i pir a lingtatuna, ma pa ta warwaruga i ki uni.
Moses ia taar taa a kum Naagagon taa muaat, iaku pa te kon muaat i taraam uni. Aawa kabina baa muaat nem na aak doko iaau?”
A kor na taara diat baalui naa, “A tabaraan ia ruk taau un ui. Woi maa i nem na aak doko ui?”
Iesu i baalu anundiat pirpir lenbi, “Iaau paam raa utnaa na kakaian, ma muaat kakaian raap uni.
Moses i taar taa a naagagon taa muaat kupi muaat a poko kikil a kum naat muaana. Iaku a naagagon mi, wakir anun Moses, a kum taara ut taanga namuga diat turpaai. Ma raa kum pakaan kaai muaat poko kikil a kum naat muaana u ra Bung Saabaat.
Baa muaat poko kikil ta naat muaana u ra Bung Saabaat, kupi koku di bubur a naagagon anun Moses, aawa kabina muaat kaankaan karom iaau baa iaau walaangalaanga paa a kudulaana muaana u ra Bung Saabaat?
Koku muaat naagagon ku u ra numuaat binabo, muaat a naagagon ma ra naagagon lingtatuna.”
Raa taara taanginaanga Ierusalem diat wetiri naa, “Mari ma ia a muaana baa diat nem na aak dokoi?
Baboi, mari i tur ma i pirpir namataa ra taara, ma pa diat pirpir baalui. Kanaapi a kum mukmuga diat aa nunurai naa ia a Kaarisito?
Baa a Kaarisito in waan paat, pa din nunurai naa in waan paat taangawaai. Iaku a muaana mi daat nunura ku anuna taamaan.”
Iesu i wawer utbaai u ra ruma na wetabaar, i pirpir ma ra ngaala na ingaana ma i piri naa, “Lelawaai muaat nunura mulu iaau ut, ma ra taamaan kaai iaau waan koni? Pa iaau waan paat urin u ra nuknuking. Ia baa i tula wa iaau i pir a lingtatuna. Ma muaat, pa muaat nunura ia baa i tula wa iaau urin.
Iaku iaau, iaau nunurai, kabina iaau waan ut koni, ma ia ut ia tula wa iaau.”
Io, a kum te Iudaia diat nemi naa diat a paam akoto paai, iaku pa te i paami, maa anuna pakaana bung pa i ot utbaai.
Mongoro ko ra kor na taara diat nurnur un Iesu ma diat piri naa, “A muaana mi i paam taa mongoro na utnaa na kakaian. Naapi Kaarisito ut mi?”
Baa a kum Parisaaio diat walangoro a taara diat pipipir ino lenbi un Iesu, io, a kum ngaala na tena wetabaar, ma a kum Parisaaio, diat tula wa a kum tena baboura ko ra ruma na wetabaar, kupi diat a paam akoto paai.
Ma Iesu i piri taan diat naa, “Iaau pang ki iwan naa muaat, ang waan balet karom ia baa i tula wa iaau urin.
Muaat a baat kup iaau, iaku pa muaat a baat pa iaau, ma pa muaat a waan laar paai kaai u ra taamaan baa ang ki iaai.”
Raa kum te Iudaia diat tiri wetwetalaai diat naa, “A muaana mi in waan ma uwaai, baa pa daat a baat laar paai? Lelawaai, in waan welwelik ma duk kup a kum taamaan anu ra taara Grik, baa anundaat taara diat ki iaai? Naapi in wer ma a taara Grik?
I piri naa daat a baat kupi ma pa daat a baat paai, ma pa daat a waan laar paai kaai u ra taamaan baa in ki iaai. Aawa kukuraai ra nuna pirpir mi?”
U ra tintinip na bung i ra lukaara, a ngaatngaat na bung, Iesu i tur ma i pirpir ma ra ngaala na ingaana, i piri naa, “Baa te i maruk, koina baa in waan karom iaau ma ang wainimi.
Welaar ma di aa timu taai u ra Buk Taabu lenbi, ‘Ia baa in nurnur un iaau, a kum daanim na lalaaun diat a welulu paat ko ra nuna lalaaun.’”
Iesu i pirpir u ra Takado na Nion, baa din tabaara diat mai baa diat nurnur uni. Maa pa di taar utbaai a Takado na Nion, kabina baa Iesu pa i lo utbaai anuna minamaar.
Raa taara ko ra kor na taara baa diat walangoro a pirpir mi, diat piri naa, “A lingtatuna ut, a muaana mi a propet baa God i tula wai urin.”
Raa taara kaai diat piri naa, “Ia a Kaarisito.” Ma raa taara kaai diat piri naa, “Pate. A Kaarisito pa in waan paat taangirong Gaalilaia.
A Buk Taabu i piri naa, Kaarisito in waan paat ko ra wuna taara anun Dewid. In waan paat irong Betilem, a taamaan baa namuga Dewid i ki iaai.”
Ma pa i raa a nuknuki ra taara uni.
Raa taara diat nem na paam akotoi, iaku pa ta paan diat i paam akotoi.
Baa a kum tena baboura ko ra ruma na wetabaar diat waan talili balet, a kum ngaala na tena wetabaar karom God diat tiri diat naa, “Aawa kabina maa pa muaat aal paa Iesu urin?”
A kum tena baboura ko ra ruma na wetabaar diat baalu diat naa, “Pa ta muaana utbaai i laana pirpir welaar ma ra muaana mi!”
A kum Parisaaio diat tiri diat naa, “Lelawaai, muaat kaai ia ben araara pa muaat?
Lelawaai muaat nuki naa te kon miaat a kum mukmuga ma ra kum Parisaaio ia nurnur uni? Pate mulu.
A kor na taara mi baa diat nurnur un Iesu, pa diat nunura a kum Naagagon anun Moses, a kaankaan anun God i ki un diat.”
Raa Parisaaio kon diat, a iaana Nikadimo, ia baa namuga i waan paat paa karom Iesu, i piri taan diat naa,
“U ra nundaat Naagagon pain daat a takuna biaa ku te baa pa di walangoroi utbaai, kupi din baat paa a utnaa baa i paami.”
Diat baalui ku naa, “Ni, ui kaai a te Gaalilaia ui? Un wawer u ra Buk Taabu ma un manaana uni naa a propet pa in waan paat taangirong Gaalilaia.” [
Ma a taara raap diat waan weraan kup anundiat kum taamtaamaan.
Iesu i waan tato unaanga u ra Taangaai na Oliwa.
U ra malaana kinalik u ra bung namur, Iesu i waan talili balet kup a ruma na wetabaar, ma a taara raap diat waan ungaai karomi. I ki ma i wer diat.
A kum tena wawer u ra kum Naagagon ma ra kum Parisaaio diat ben ruk paa raa tabuan karom Iesu. A tabuan maa di baraata paai baa i paam aakaina ma raa muaana. Diat wowo paa a tabuan maa kupi in tur namuga namataa ra taara.
Diat piri taan Iesu naa, “Tena Wawer, a tabuan mi di baraata paai baa i paam aakaina ma raa muaana.
U ra Naagagon anun Moses, baa ta tabuan in paami lenmaa, din duka dokoi ma ra kum waat. Io ui, aawa maa un piri uni?”
Diat tiri lenmi, kabina diat nem na walaar ku Iesu mai, baa in pir taa ta pirpir, io, diat a takunai mai. Iaku Iesu i ki pari napia, ma i timtimu ma in kaalkaali na limaana.
Baa diat tirtiri lenmaa, i tur ma i piri taan diat naa, “Baa te kon muaat pa i paam taa ta aakaina mangamangaan, io, in duka muga a tabuan mi ma tina waat.”
Iesu i ki pari balet, ma i timtimu balet ma in kaalkaali na limaana.
Baa diat walangoro taa a pirpir mi anun Iesu, diat raap diat pari. A kum lapun diat pari muga, ma namur diat raap raaraa. Iesu maku i ki matira, diaar ma ra tabuan baa di watur taai naana.
Iesu i tur, ma i piri taa ra tabuan naa, “Neling, diat baa diat takuna ui, kuraa ma diat awaai? Pa te kon diat i naagagon ta ui?”
A tabuan i baalui naa, “Pate.” Ma Iesu i piri taana naa, “Iaau kaai pang naagagon ui. Un waan ku, ma koku balet ma u paam aakaina.”]
Iesu i pirpir balet karom a taara, ma i piri naa, “Iaau a kaapa anu ra rakrakaan buaal. Ia baa i murmur iaau, in paam akoto a kaapa na lalaaun, ma pa in waanwaan balet ma u ra baboto.”
A kum Parisaaio diat piri taana naa, “Anum wewapua pa i mawaat, maa ui ut u wewapua balet un ui.”
Ma Iesu i baalu diat naa, “Baa iaau ut iaau wewapua un iaau, anung wewapua i lingtatuna, maa iaau nunura a taamaan iaau waan koni, ma a taamaan ang waan kupi. Iaku muaat, pa muaat nunura a taamaan iaau waan koni, ma a taamaan baa ang waan kupi.
Muaat, muaat naagagon ku ma ra naagagon anu ra taara, ma iaau pa iaau naagagon te.
Baa iaau naagagon, anung naagagon i takado, kabina wakir iaau ku iaau paami, mir ut ma Tamaang, ia baa i tula wa iaau urin.
Di aa timu taai u ra numuaat Naagagon lenbi, ‘Baa ta rudi anundiaar pirpir i welaar ku un ta utnaa, anundiaar pirpir i lingtatuna.’
Iaau mi iaau wewapua un iaau, ma Tamaang baa i tula wa iaau urin, ia kaai i wewapua un iaau.”
Diat tiri naa, “Kuraa awaai tamaam?” Iesu i baalu diat naa, “Pa muaat nunura iaau ma pa muaat nunura kaai Tamaang. Baa gun muaat a nunura iaau, io, muaat a nunura kaai Tamaang.”
Iesu i pir a pirpir mi u ra ruma na wetabaar, u ra wanua baa di laana ung a maani na wetabaar iaai. Pa te i paam akotoi, maa anuna pakaana bung pa i ot utbaai.
Iesu i piri balet taa ra taara naa, “Ang waan kon muaat, muaat a baat kup iaau, ma muaat a maat ma ra numuaat kum aakaina mangamangaan. A taamaan baa ang waan kupi, pa muaat a waan laar paai iaai.”
Raa kum te Iudaia diat piri naa, “Aawa kukuraaina baa i piri naa, ‘A taamaan baa ang waan kupi, pa muaat a waan laar paai iaai’? Naapi in aak doko paai ma duk?”
Iesu i baalu diat naa, “Muaat taanga main ut muaat napia, ma iaau, iaau waan ut taanginaanga nate. Muaat ko ra rakrakaan buaal, iaau wakir ko ra rakrakaan buaal.
Bi ia a kabina baa iaau piri taa muaat naa muaat a maat ma ra numuaat kum aakaina mangamangaan. Baa pa muaat nurnur un iaau baa iaau ia ut mi iaau, io, muaat a maat ma ra numuaat kum aakaina mangamangaan.”
Ma diat tiri naa, “Woi ui?” Iesu i piri taan diat, “Iaau aa wapua ta muaat turpaai u ra nung pinapaam, tuk mi.
Mongoro na utnaa ang piri un muaat baa ang naagagon muaat uni, maa ia baa i tula wa iaau i lingtatuna, ma iaau, iaau wapua ku a taara u ra rakrakaan buaal u ra kum utnaa iaau walangoroi koni.”
Pa diat nunurai naa Iesu i pirpir karom diat un Tamaana.
Ma Iesu i piri naa, “Baa muaat a watur tato Natu ra Muaana unaanga nate, muaat a nunurai naa iaau ut mi iaau, ma muaat a nunurai kaai naa wakir iaau ot ku iaau papaam, Tamaang i wer iaau u ra kum utnaa iaau piri.
Ia baa i tula wa iaau i ki karom iaau, pa i waan kon iaau, kabina baa iaau paampaam a kum utnaa baa i gaaia uni.”
Mongoro baa diat walangoro a kum pirpir mi, diat nurnur un Iesu.
Iesu i piri karom a kum te Iudaia baa diat nurnur uni naa, “Baa muaat taraam u ra nung wawer, io, muaat anung taara na wawer mulu.
Ma muaat a nunura a lingtatuna, ma a lingtatuna in walaangalaanga muaat.”
Diat baalu Iesu naa, “Miaat a kum natnatun Aabaraam, tuk mi pa miaat papaam na wilawilaau karom te. Aawa kabina baa u piri naa a lingtatuna in walaangalaanga miaat?”
Iesu i baalu diat naa, “Iaau pir a lingtatuna taa muaat, ia baa i paam aakaina, ia a wilawilaau anu ra aakaina mangamangaan.
A muaana baa i papaam na wilawilaau ku karom ta naadiwaatamaana, pa in ki takum karom diat, iaku a naat baa tamaana ma naana diaar buta paai, ia maa kon diaar mulu.
Baa Natun God i walaangalaanga muaat, muaat a laangalaanga mulu.
Iaau nunurai ut naa muaat a kum natun Aabaraam, iaku mi muaat walaari kupi muaat a aak doko iaau, kabina maa anung pirpir pa i ki un muaat.
Iaau pirpir u ra kum utnaa baa iaau baboi kon Tamaang, ma muaat kaai, muaat paam a kum utnaa baa muaat walangoroi kon tamaamuaat.”
Diat baalui naa, “Miaat, miaat tamaana ma Aabaraam.” Iesu i baalu diat naa, “Baa muaat tamaana mulu ma Aabaraam, muaat a paam a kum utnaa baa Aabaraam i paami.
Muaat nem na aak doko iaau ku, baa iaau wapua muaat u ra lingtatuna baa iaau walangoroi kon God. Aabaraam pa i paam ta utnaa lenmi.
Muaat, muaat paampaam ut a kum pinapaam baa tamaamuaat i paami.” Diat piri taan Iesu naa, “Wakir di buta biaa ta miaat ku u ra aakapi, tamaamiaat ut maa God.”
Iesu i piri taan diat naa, “Kaduk baa muaat tamaana mulu ma God, io, muaat a maari iaau, kabina maa iaau waan paat kon God, ma mi iaau ki min. Pa iaau waan paat u ra nung nemnem, ia ut i tula wa iaau.
Aawa kabina baa pa muaat nunura lele anung pirpir? Kabina pa muaat walangoro laar paai.
Tamaamuaat maa Saataan, ma muaat nemi ut naa muaat a murmur anuna nemnem. Taanga namuga utbaai, ia a tena aak doko taara, ma pa i nunura a lingtatuna, kabina pa ta lingtatuna i ki uni. Baa i pir a warwaruga, i pirpir ma ra nuna pirpir mulu ut, kabina ia a tena warwaruga ma ia ut a tamaa ra warwaruga.
Iaau pir a lingtatuna, mi ia a kabina baa pa muaat nurnur un iaau.
Woi kon muaat in takuna ot pa iaau un ta aakaina mangamangaan? Baa iaau pir a lingtatuna, i lawaai maa pa muaat nurnur un iaau?
Ia baa i waan paat kon God i walangoro a kum pirpir anun God. Iaku muaat, wakir muaat waan paat kon God, mi ia a kabina baa pa muaat walangoroi.”
Raa kum te Iudaia diat piri taan Iesu lenbi, “Miaat nunura mului naa ui a te Samaaria, ma a tabaraan ia ruk taau un ui.”
Ma Iesu i baalu diat naa, “Pa ta tabaraan i ruk taau un iaau. Iaau urur karom Tamaang, ma muaat, pa muaat urur karom iaau.
Pa iaau paam ta utnaa kupi a taara diat a wangaala pa iaau uni, iaku raa ot ku, a ngaala na tena naagagon, i wangaala pa iaau.
Iaau pir a lingtatuna taa muaat, ia baa i taraam u ra nung pirpir, pa in maat.”
Raa kum te Iudaia diat piri taana naa, “Mi miaat nunura mului naa a tabaraan ia ruk taau un ui! Aabaraam ia maat, ma a kum propet kaai diat aa maat, iaku ui u piri naa te baa i taraam u ra num pirpir pa in maat.
Lelawaai, u nuki naa ui ma maa u ngaala taan tamaamiaat Aabaraam? Aabaraam ia maat, ma ra kum propet kaai diat aa maat. U nuki naa ui woi na mangaana muaana ui?”
Iesu i baalu diat naa, “Baa iaau wangaala balet pa iaau ut, anung pirpir pa i gaa un ta utnaa. Tamaang ut i wangaala pa iaau, ia baa muaat piri naa ia anumuaat God.
Muaat, pa muaat nunura God, iaau, iaau nunurai. Baa ang piri naa pa iaau nunurai, iaau kaai ang tena warwaruga welaar ma muaat. Iaau nunura God, ma iaau tartaraam u ra nuna pirpir.
Tamaamuaat Aabaraam i gaaia kupi in babo anung winawaan paat. I baboi, ma i gaaia aakit uni.”
A kum te Iudaia diat piri taana naa, “Pa i 50 utbaai anum kilaala na lalaaun. I lawaai maa u piri naa u aa babo taa Aabaraam?”
Iesu i baalu diat naa, “Iaau pir a lingtatuna taa muaat, namuga baa pa di buta utbaai Aabaraam, iaau aa lalaaun.”
Diat lo paa a kum waat kupi diat a duka Iesu mai, iaku Iesu i paraau waanwaan naliwan u ra kor na taara ma i waan ko ra ruma na wetabaar.
Baa Iesu i waan waanwaan, i babo paa raa muaana, a pula. Baa naana i buta paai, ia pula.
Anuna kum naat na wawer diat tiri lenbi, “Tena Wawer, aawa kabina maa di buta paai ia pula? Woi maa i paam aakaina mangamangaan, ia ut baa tamaana ma naana?”
Iesu i piri naa, “A muaana mi pa i paam ta aakaina mangamangaan, tamaana kaai ma naana pate. I pula ku kupi a taara diat a babo a dekdekin God uni.
I koina kupi daat a paam ut a kum pinapaam anun ia baa i tula wa iaau urin baa i mage utbaai. Baa ia marum, pain te balet ma in papaam laar paai.
Baa iaau ki min napia, iaau a kaapa anu ra rakrakaan buaal.”
Baa Iesu ia pir taai lenmi, i gaar taau unapia, i gigiaana paa a gaarina ungaai ma ra pia, ma i aalu a ruin kiok na mataa ra pula mai.
Iesu i piri taana naa, “Un waan, ma un gi paa mataam u ra daanim Siloaam.” (Siloaam a kukuraaina baa di tulai.) Io, i waan, ma i gi paa a mataana. Baa i waan talili a ruin kiok na mataana diaar aa tapalaa.
A kum teptepaana, ma a taara baa diat bababoi baa i aaraaring utnaa diat wetiri naa, “Wakir duk a muaana baa i kiki ma i aaraaring utnaa?”
Raa taara diat piri naa, “Ia ut maa.” Raa taara kaai diat piri naa, “Pate, i babo welaar ku ma ra muaana maa.” Io, ia ut i piri naa, “Iaau ut mi.”
Diat tiri naa, “Di wababo lelawaai paa a ruin kiok na mataam?”
I baalu diat naa, “A muaana baa di waatungi naa Iesu, i paam paa a pia, ma i aalu taa a mataang mai. Io, i tula wa iaau ma i piri lenbi, ‘Un waan urong u ra daanim Siloaam kupi un gi paa a mataam.’ Baa iaau waan ma iaau gi paa a mataang, iaau babo maut.”
Diat tiri naa, “Kuraa ma ia awaai?” A muaana maa i baalu diat naa, “Pa iaau nunurai.”
Diat ben paa a muaana baa namuga i pula karom a kum Parisaaio,
kabina maa Iesu i paam a pia ma i wababo paai u ra Bung Saabaat.
A kum Parisaaio diat tiri balet a muaana naa, “Di wababo lelawaai pa ui?” I wapua diat naa, “I ung taa a pia u ra ruin kiok na mataang, iaau gi paai, io iaau babo maut.”
Raa kum Parisaaio diat piri naa, “A muaana maa i paam a utnaa mi, ia wakir kon God, maa i papaam u ra Bung Saabaat.” Raa taara kaai diat piri naa, “Baa a muaana mi a aakaina muaana, in paam lelawaai a kum utnaa na kakaian mi?” Lenmaa a nuknukindiat pa i raa uni.
Raa pakaan balet a kum Parisaaio diat tiri a muaana maa naa, “Aawa un piri u ra muaana baa i wababo paa a mataam?” I baalu diat naa, “Ia a propet.”
Raa kum te Iudaia pa diat nurnur u ra pirpir bi naa, a muaana mi namuga i pula ma di wababo paai. Ma diat wetulaa paa ut tamaana ma naana, ma diat tiri diaar lenbi,
“Mi ut ia natumur, baa mur piri naa mur buta paai ia pula? Aawa kabina mi i babo?”
Tamaana ma naana diaar baalu diat naa, “Mir nunurai naa natumir ut mi, ma mir nunurai naa mir buta paai ia pula.
Iaku pa mir nunurai naa i babo lelawaai, pa mir nunurai kaai baa woi mi i wababo paai. Ia ngaala na muaana, muaat a tiri, ia ut in wewapua kaapa uni.”
Tamaana ma naana diaar pirpir lenmi, kabina diaar burutaana a kum te Iudaia, maa diat piri naa, baa te in nurnur un Iesu naa ia a Kaarisito, din turbaat wai ko ra ruma na lotu.
Bi ia a kabina baa tamaa ra muaana maa ma naana diaar piri naa, “A ngaala na muaana ut maa, muaat a tiri ku.”
A weru pakaan diat ben paa balet a muaana maa, ia baa di buta paai ia pula, ma diat piri taana naa, “Un weweliman namataan God baa a utnaa baa u piri i lingtatuna ut! Miaat nunurai naa a muaana baa i wababo pa ui a tena aakaina.”
I baalu diat naa, “Pa iaau nunurai baa a tena aakaina baa pate. Raa utnaa ku baa iaau nunurai: Namuga iaau pula, ma mi iaau aa babo.”
Diat tiri naa, “Aawa maa i paami un ui? Ma i wababo lelawaai paa a ruin kiok na mataam?”
I baalu diat naa, “Iaau aa pir taai taa muaat, ma pa muaat walangoroi. Aawa kabina baa muaat nem na walangoroi balet? Kanaapi muaat kaai muaat nemi kupi muaat anuna kum naat na wawer?”
Diat pir aakakai, ma diat piri uni naa, “Ui anuna naat na wawer, iaku miaat a kum naat na wawer anun Moses.
Miaat, miaat nunura Moses baa God i pirpir karomi, iaku a muaana maa pa miaat nunurai naa i waan taangawaai.”
A muaana i baalu diat naa, “Aai, a utnaa na kakaian! Pa muaat nunurai naa i waan taangawaai, iaku ia wababo pa iaau.
Daat nunurai naa God pa in walangoro a aaraaring anu ra kum tena aakaina, in walangoro ku ia baa i rui ma i tartaraam u ra nuna nemnem.
Namuga utbaai u ra turpaai ra rakrakaan buaal tuk mi, pa di nunura taa te baa in wababo paa mataan ta pula, baa di buta paai a pula ku.
Baa a muaana mi wakir kon God pa in paam laar paa ta utnaa.”
Diat baalui naa, “Di buta pa ui u ra mangamangaan aakaina, ma ui, u nemi naa un wer miaat!” Io, diat turbaat wai maut ko ra ruma na lotu.
Baa Iesu i walangoroi naa a muaana mi di aa lu wai, i baat kupi ma baa i baat paai i tiri naa, “Lelawaai, u nurnur ut u ra Natu ra Muaana?”
I baalui naa, “Tadaaru, un wapua iaau baa woi maa Natu ra Muaana, kupi ang nurnur uni.”
Iesu i piri taana naa, “Mi u aa baboi, iaau ut mi iaau pirpir taam.”
A muaana maa i piri naa, “Tadaaru, iaau nurnur!” I ki but keke ma i lotu karomi.
Iesu i piri naa, “Iaau waan paat urin u ra rakrakaan buaal ma ra naagagon, kupi diat baa diat pula diat a babo, ma diat baa diat babo diat a pula.”
Raa kum Parisaaio baa diat weur mai, diat walangoro a pirpir mi, ma diat tiri Iesu naa, “U nuki naa miaat kaai miaat pula?”
Iesu i baalu diat naa, “Baa gun muaat pula pain te in takuna muaat un ta aakaina mangamangaan, iaku mi muaat piri naa muaat babo, io, anumuaat mangamangaan aakaina i ki utbaai.”
Iesu i piri naa, “Iaau pir a lingtatuna taa muaat, ia baa pa i ruk u ra bonanaaka i ra liplip na sip, ma i kaa bolo ku unaruma, ia a tena walong ma a tena maangluraa paa ku a kum utnaa.
Iaku a muaana baa i ruk takado u ra bonanaaka, ia maa a tena baboura sip lingtatuna.
A tena baboura i ra bonanaaka in paapa aara taai kupi in ruk. A kum sip diat walangoro lele in ingaana. I wataa diat ma ra kum iaandiat, ma i ben apari diat.
Baa ia ben apari raap paa anuna kum sip, i muga pa diat ma diat murmuri, kabina maa diat walangoro lele in ingaana.
Pa diat a murmur ta waira, diat a welulu ingen ku koni, maa pa diat walangoro lele in ingaana.”
Iesu i pir a pirpir welwelaar mi taan diat, iaku pa diat nunurai baa aawa maa i pirpir welwelaar uni.
Io, Iesu i piri balet naa, “Iaau pir a lingtatuna taa muaat, iaau a bonanaaka anu ra kum sip.
Diat baa diat waan paat muga taang, a kum tena walong ma a kum tena maangluraa paa a kum utnaa, ma a kum sip pa diat walangoro diat.
Iaau a bonanaaka, baa te i ruk uni din walaauni. In ruk, in pari ma in baraata ku ana utnaa na winangaan.
A tena walong i ruk ku kupi in walong, ma in aak doko a kum sip ma in baanaakaka diat. Iaku iaau, iaau waan paat kupi diat a paam akoto a lalaaun, a lalaaun lingtatuna.
“Iaau a koina tena baboura sip. Iaau taar taa anung lalaaun kupi ang maat un diat.
A muaana baa di dokdoki ku, wakir a tena baboura sip mulu, ma wakir anuna kum sip. Baa i babo paa a karangaap na paap i waan paat, i welulu paa ku ko ra kum sip, kabina maa i papaam ku kup a maani, ma pa i maari a kum sip. Ma a karangaap na paap i karaat diat ma i lu weraana wa diat.
“Iaau a koina tena baboura sip. Welaar ma Tamaang i nunura iaau, ma iaau nunura Tamaang, lenkaai maa iaau nunura anung kum sip, ma anung kum sip kaai diat nunura iaau, ma iaau taar taa anung lalaaun kupi ang maat un diat.
Anung raa kum sip ingen kaai, pa diat ki u ra liplip na sip mi. Ang ben pa diat utkaai, ma diat a walangoro in ingaang, kupi diat raap diat a ki ku un raa liplip na sip, ma raa ot ku in tena baboura anundiat.
“Tamaang i maari iaau, kabina maa iaau ut iaau taar taa anung lalaaun, kupi namur ang lo paai balet.
Pa te in rakaan wa anung lalaaun, iaau ut ang taar taai. Iaau ut iaau naagagoni kupi ang taar taai, ma iaau ut iaau naagagoni kupi ang lo paai balet. Mari ia a pinapaam maa Tamaang i tula wa iaau kupi ang paami.”
Ia ru nuknuki ra kum te Iudaia u ra kum pirpir mi anun Iesu.
Mongoro kon diat, diat piri naa, “A tabaraan i ruk taau uni, ma ia longlong. Aawa maa muaat walangoroi kupi?”
Iaku raa taara diat piri naa, “Wakir a mangaana pirpir mi anun te baa a tabaraan i ruk taau uni. Lelawaai, a muaana baa a tabaraan i ruk uni in pet laar paai baa in wababo a taara baa diat pula? Painte.”
Io, diat paam a lukaara baa diat nuk paa balet a bung baa diat paapa a ruma na wetabaar uni. Diat paam a lukaara mi inaanga Ierusalem un raa bung u ra kum kalaang na madiring.
Ma Iesu i waan waanwaan u ra baraada baa di waatungi naa a baraada anun Solomon, u ra ruma na wetabaar.
A kum te Iudaia diat tur lili paa Iesu, ma diat tiri lenbi, “Unaangaian ma un wapua mulu miaat? Baa ui a Kaarisito, un wapua kaapa miaat.”
Iesu i baalu diat naa, “Iaau aa pir taai taa muaat, iaku pa muaat nurnur. A kum pinapaam iaau paami u ra iaan Tamaang, diat wewapua kaapa un iaau.
Iaku pa muaat nurnur, maa wakir muaat anung kum sip.
Anung kum sip diat walangoro in ingaang, ma iaau nunura diat, ma diat murmur iaau.
Ma iaau taar a lalaaun takum taan diat, ma pa diat a wirua. Ma pa te in raa wa diat ko ra limaang.
Tamaang baa i taar ta diat taang, i ngaala taa ra kum utnaa raap, ma pa te in raa wa diat ko ra limaan Tamaang.
Mir ma Tamaang, mir raa ku.”
A kum te Iudaia diat lo paa balet a kum waat kupi diat a duka Iesu mai.
Iesu i piri taan diat naa, “Iaau aa paam waiaa taa mongoro na utnaa na kakaian namataamuaat, baa Tamaang i taar taai taang kupi ang paami. Woi na utnaa ko ra kum utnaa na kakaian mi muaat nem na duka iaau uni?”
Diat baalui naa, “Miaat nem na duka ui, wakir un ta utnaa na kakaian baa u paami, iaku maa kabina u wakinalik paa God! Ui a muaana ku ui, ma u piri naa ui God.”
Iesu i piri taan diat naa, “Muaat nunurai ut naa di aa timu taai u ra numuaat kum Naagagon naa God i piri ‘Muaat a kum god’.
I waatung diat naa diat a kum god, diat baa di taar taa a pirpir anun God taan diat, ma i dekdek kupi te in rakaan wa a pirpir na Buk Taabu.
Ma iaau, baa Tamaang ut i pilak pa iaau, ma i tula wa iaau urin u ra rakrakaan buaal, iaau wakinalik lelawaai paa God, baa iaau piri naa iaau Natun God?
Baa pa iaau paam a kum pinapaam anun Tamaang, io, koku muaat nurnur un iaau.
Mi iaau paam ut anuna kum pinapaam, iaku pa muaat nurnur un iaau. Muaat a nurnur kabina u ra kum pinapaam iaau paami, kupi muaat a nunurai naa Tamaang i ki un iaau, ma iaau ki un Tamaang.”
Raa pakaan balet diat nem na paam akoto Iesu, iaku i waan ino paa ku kon diat.
Iesu i waan bolo balet u ra daanim Ioridaan kup a wanua baa namuga Ioaanes i baapitaaiso iaai, ma i ki matira.
Mongoro na taara diat waan karom Iesu ma diat pirpir wetwetalaai karom diat naa, “Ioaanes pa i paam ta utnaa na kakaian, iaku a kum pirpir raap ia pir taai u ra muaana mi, i lingtatuna aakit.”
Ma mongoro na taara matira diat nurnur uni.
Raa muaana taangirong Betaania, a iaana Laasaro, i malaapaang. Ditul tenalik ma Maaria ma Maataa. Maaria mi, ia baa i labo taa in palaa na mangingi u ra ru kaki ra Tadaaru, ma i upa magege diaar ma ra weu na lorina.
Maaria dinawawina ma Maataa diaar taar wa a pirpir kup Iesu lenbi, “Tadaaru, tepaam baa u maari aakiti i malaapaang.”
Baa Iesu i walangoroi, i piri lenbi, “Wakir Laasaro in maat u ra malaapaang mi. I malaapaang ku kupi din babo a minamaar anun God, ma kupi kaai din maar paa Natun God mai.”
Iesu i maari Maataa ma tenawawina Maaria ma teindiaar Laasaro.
Iaku baa ia walangoroi baa Laasaro i malaapaang, pa i ngaraa, i ki paa balet ut ru bung u ra taamaan maa i ki iaai.
Namur Iesu i wapua a kum naat na wawer naa, “Daat a waan talili balet urong u ra papaar Iudaia.”
Ma diat piri taana naa, “Aai, Tena Wawer, uraa bung ku a kum te Iudaia diat nem na duka doko ui, ma mi u nem na waan talili balet ku urong?”
Iesu i piri naa, “Raa bung i welaar ma 12 pakaana bung, naka? Baa te i waanwaan u ra mage pa in tutukaa, kabina i babo u ra kaapa i ra rakrakaan buaal.
Iaku baa te i waanwaan u ra marum in tutukaa, maa kabina pa ta kaapa.”
Iesu i pir taa a pirpir mi taan diat, ma i piri balet naa, “Tepaandaat Laasaro ia inep duman, ma ang waan kupi ang waangun paai.”
A kum naat na wawer diat baalui naa, “Tadaaru, baa i inep duman ku, in laangalaanga balet.”
Iesu i pirpir u ra minaatin Laasaro, iaku a kum naat na wawer diat nuki naa Laasaro i inep duman ku.
Io, Iesu i pir palaai maraagaam taan diat naa, “Laasaro ia maat.
Ma iaau, iaau gaaia un muaat baa pa iaau ki marong, kupi muaat a nurnur. Io, mi daat a waan ma kupi.”
Tomaas baa di waatungi kaai ma Kaanga i piri taa ra kum naat na wawer naa, “Daat a weur kupi daat kaai daat a maat ungaai mai.”
Baa Iesu i waan paat, i walangoroi naa di aa waruk wa a minaatin Laasaro u ra babaang na minaat, ma ia waat na bung baat taai.
A taamaan Betaania i marawaai ku Ierusalem, i welaar ku ma tula kilomita,
lenmaa mongoro na te Iudaia diat waan paat kup Maataa ma Maaria kupi diat a wamaraam diaar u ra teindiaar baa i maat.
Baa Maataa i walangoroi naa Iesu kuraa ma i waan urin, i pari ma i waan baraatai, iaku Maaria i ki utbaai naruma.
Maataa i piri taan Iesu naa, “Tadaaru, baa gun un ki ut min, tenglik pa in maat.
Iaku iaau nunurai naa, baa un aaring God kup ta utnaa mi, in taari ku taam.”
Iesu i piri taana naa, “Temlik in lalaaun balet ku.”
Maataa i baalui, “Iaau nunurai naa in lalaaun balet u ra tintinip na bung.”
Iesu i piri taana naa, “Iaau a lalaaun balet ko ra minaat, ma iaau a lalaaun lingtatuna. Ia baa i nurnur un iaau, baa i maat, in lalaaun balet,
ma ia baa i lalaaun ma i nurnur un iaau, pa in maat. U nurnur lenmaa?”
Maataa i baalui naa, “Maia Tadaaru, iaau nurnur baa ui a Kaarisito, Natun God, ia baa God i tula wai urin u ra rakrakaan buaal.”
Namur baa Maataa ia pir taai lenmi, i waan talili ma i wataa ino paa tenawawina Maaria, ma i wapuai naa, “A Tena Wawer ia waan paat ma i wetiri kup ui.”
Baa Maaria i walangoroi lenmi, i pari gagaa ma i waan karomi.
Iesu pa i waan paat utbaai u ra taamaan, i ki utbaai u ra wanua baa Maataa i baraata paai iaai.
A kum te Iudaia baa diat ki ungaai ma Maaria naruma kupi diat a wamaraami, diat baboi baa i pari gagaa paa kon diat unataamaan, ma diat murmuri. Maa diat nuki naa in waan kup a babaang na minaat kupi in luan iaai.
Baa Maaria i waan paat u ra wanua baa Iesu i ki iaai, i babo paai, i ki but keke taau namuga naana, ma i piri naa, “Tadaaru, baa gun un ki ut min, tenglik pa in maat.”
Baa Iesu i babo Maaria ungaai ma ra kum te Iudaia baa diat weur mai diat luluan, i ngaraa aakit u ra niono ma in balaana i tapunuk.
Iesu i tiri diat naa, “Kuraa muaat ung taa a minaatina awaai?” Diat baalui naa, “Tadaaru, waan urin baa un baboi.”
Io, Iesu i luan.
A kum te Iudaia diat piri naa, “Muaat baboi, i maari aakiti!”
Iaku raa taara kon diat, diat piri naa, “I wababo paa a mataa ra pula, i lawaai maa pa i walaangalaanga paa kaai a muaana mi, kupi koku i maat?”
Iesu i tapunuk aakit, baa i waan paat naa ra babaang na minaat. A babaang na minaat maa a maata u ra papaara waat, ma di ung baat taai ma ra ina ngaala na waat.
Iesu i piri taan diat, “Muaat a tul karaai wa ina waat.” Ma Maataa, tei ra muaana baa i maat, i baalu Iesu naa, “Tadaaru, ia aangina, maa ia waat na bung baat taai!”
Iesu i piri taana naa, “Lelawaai, pa iaau pir taai utbaai taam naa, baa un nurnur un babo a minamaar anun God?”
Io, diat tul karaai wa ina waat. Iesu i tataada unaanga nate, ma i piri lenbi, “Tamaang, iaau waatung wakaak karom ui, maa u aa walangoro iaau.
Iaau nunurai naa u laana walangoro iaau, iaku iaau pirpir lenmi, kabina u ra taara mi, kupi diat a nurnur baa u tula wa iaau.”
Baa ia pir taai lenmi, i wewataai ma ra ina ngaala na ingaana naa, “Laasaro, un pari!”
Laasaro i pari, ungaai ma ra kum maalu baa di raau taa a ru limaana ma ra ru kakina mai, ma raa pakaana maalu kaai baa di pulu baat taa a mataana mai. Iesu i piri taan diat naa, “Muaat a palaa wa a kum maalu na minaat koni kupi in waan.”
Mongoro na te Iudaia baa diat ki naan Maaria, diat babo a utnaa mi Iesu i paami, ma diat nurnur uni.
Iaku raa taara kon diat, baa diat waan talili, diat waan karom a kum Parisaaio ma diat wapua diat u ra utnaa mi Iesu i paami.
A kum ngaala na tena wetabaar karom God, ma ra kum Parisaaio diat wataa ungaai a taara na kiwung, ma diat piri naa, “Aawa daat a paami? A muaana mi i paam mongmongoro na utnaa na kakaian.
Baa daat a maadek wai, a taara raap diat a nurnur uni, ma a kum taara na wineium taangirong Rom diat a waan paat ma diat a reng wa anundaat ruma na wetabaar ma diat a rakaan wa kaai anundaat mataanitu.”
Raa kon diat a iaana Kaaiapaas, a mukmuga na tena wetabaar karom God u ra kilaala maa, i piri naa, “Aai, pa muaat manaana.
Pa muaat nunurai naa in koina karom muaat baa te in maat baat a taara, kupi koku a taara raap diat a wirua.”
Wakir i pir biaai ku, maa kabina ia a mukmuga na tena wetabaar karom God u ra kilaala maa, i pirpir na propet baa Iesu in maat u ra taara Iudaia.
Ma wakir un diat ku, u ra taara raap utkaai anun God baa diat ki un raa kum taamaan ingen, kupi in ben ungaai pa diat ma diat a raa ku.
U ra bung ut maa, a kum mukmuga anu ra taara Iudaia diat turpaa pirpir kup ta kum aakapi kupi diat a aak doko maku Iesu.
Lenmaa Iesu pa i waanwaan ma namataandiat. I waan paa taanga matira, kup a taamaan Eparaaim marawaai u ra bil na wanua, ma diat ki matira ma ra nuna kum naat na wawer.
Baa ia marawaai a lukaara na waan likaai anu ra taara Iudaia, mongoro na taara ko ra kum taamaan diat muga unaanga Ierusalem, kupi diat a wagomgom muga pa diat namataan God baa pa di paam utbaai a lukaara, welaar ma ra mangamangaan i ra nundiat lotu.
Matira, diat baatbaat kup Iesu. Baa diat tur ungaai taau u ra ruma na wetabaar, diat tiri wetwetalaai diat naa, “Aawa muaat nuki, in waan ut urin u ra lukaara, baa pate?”
A kum ngaala na tena wetabaar ma ra kum Parisaaio diat wetulaa naa baa te ia babo taa Iesu, in wewapua gagaa uni baa kuraa i ki awaai, kupi diat a paam koto paai.
6 na bung utbaai namuga taa ra lukaara na waan likaai, Iesu i waan paat urong Betaania, a taamaan anun Laasaro, a muaana baa Iesu i walaaun paai balet ko ra minaat.
Ma diat paam a laaplaapir un Iesu matira. Maataa i waraaut u ra oko utnaa karom diat, ma Laasaro ia raa kon diat baa diat ki ungaai ma Iesu u ra laaplaapir.
Ma Maaria i lo paa in palaa na mangingi baa di waatungi naa naad, i ngaatngaat aakit. Ma i laboi u ra ru kakin Iesu, ma i upai ma ra weu na lorina. Ma ra aangawi ra in palaa na mangingi maa i wateng paa a ruma maa.
Raa ko ra kum naat na wawer anun Iesu, Iudaas Iskaariot, ia baa in wagu taa Iesu, i piri naa,
“Aawa kabina maa pa di wiura in palaa na mangingi mi kup ta 300 na denaaria kupi din tabaara a kum iba na taara mai?”
I piri lenmi, wakir a kabina maa i maari a iba na taara, pate. I kabina maa ia i laana baboura anundiat maani ma i laana lolo inoi, maa ia a tena walong.
Baa Iesu i walangoro a pirpir maa anun Iudaas, i piri naa, “Maadek wa a tabuan mi, maa ia paam taa a pinapaam mi un iaau kup anung bung na minaat.
A kum iba na taara diat lalaaun ungaai ut ma muaat, iaku iaau pang ki takum naa muaat.”
Baa a kor na taara ko ra taara Iudaia diat walangoroi naa Iesu kurong ia Betaania, diat waan urong. Wakir diat waan kup diat a babo Iesu ku, diat waan utkaai kupi diat a babo Laasaro, ia baa Iesu ia walaaun paai ko ra minaat.
Io, a kum ngaala na tena wetabaar diat wepaak kupi diat a aak doko utkaai Laasaro.
Maa kabina un Laasaro mongoro na te Iudaia diat waan kon diat ma diat nurnur un Iesu.
U ra bung namur a ngaala na kor na taara baa diat waan paat kup a lukaara na waan likaai, diat walangoroi naa Iesu kaai in waan ut unaanga Ierusalem.
Io, diat lo paa a kum turun na baaibaai ma diat waan kupi diat a baraata Iesu mai. Ma diat kulkulaai lenbi, “Osaana! Daat a pir walaawa paa ia baa i waan paat u ra iaa ra Tadaaru! Daat a pir walaawa paa a King anu ra taara Israael!”
Iesu i ben paa a dongki, ma i ki taau nate uni, welaar ma ra Buk Taabu ia pir taai uni lenbi,
“A taara Sion, koku muaat burut. Baboi, anumuaat king i waan paat, i ki u ra naat na dongki.”
A kum naat na wawer anun Iesu pa diat nunura lelei naa a kum utnaa mi di aa timu muga taai u ra Buk Taabu. Iaku baa Iesu ia ki u ra nuna minamaar, io, diat nunurai maraagaam naa di aa timu taa a kum utnaa mi un Iesu, ma di aa paam taa kaai a kum utnaa mi uni.
Mongoro na taara baa diat tur ungaai ma Iesu baa i wataa pari paa Laasaro ko ra babaang na minaat ma i walaaun paai, diat maa diat wewapua waanwaan uni.
Ma mongoro na taara diat waan kupi diat a baraata Iesu, kabina maa diat aa walangoro taa a wewapua u ra utnaa na kakaian mi.
A kum Parisaaio diat pirpir wetwetalaai karom diat naa, “Muaat baboi, pa daat a paam laar paa ta utnaa baa daat nem na paami uni. Maa a taara ko ra rakrakaan buaal raap diat aa murmuri.”
Raa kum te Grik kaai diat waan unaanga Ierusalem u ra lukaara na waan likaai, kupi diat a lotu.
Ma diat waan karom Pilipo, a te Betsaaida. Betsaaida a taamaan u ra papaar Gaalilaia. Ma diat piri taana naa, “Le, miaat nemi naa miaat a babo Iesu.”
Pilipo i waan ma i wapua Aanderiaas, io, diaar waan ma diaar wapua taa Iesu.
Ma Iesu i piri taan diaar naa, “A pakaana bung ia waan paat baa din maar a Natu ra Muaana.
Iaau pir a lingtatuna taa muaat, baa in waina wit pa in puka taau u ra pia ma pa in maat paa, in taana taau lenutmaa, raain ku. Iaku baa in maat paa, in wa ta mongoro na waina.
Ia baa i maari aakit anuna lalaaun, in wirua, ma ia baa pa i maari baat anuna lalaaun main u ra rakrakaan buaal, in paam koto a lalaaun kup a lalaaun takum.
Baa te i nemi naa iaau anuna Tadaaru, koina baa in murmur iaau, ma ia anung tultul ma in ki ungaai ma iaau u ra pakaana baa ang ki iaai. Baa te i taraam karom iaau, Tamaang in wangaala paai.
“Mari anung lalaaun i mawaat aakit. Aawa maa ang piri? Lelawaai, ang piri lenbi, ‘Tamaang, un walaaun iaau ko ra pakaana bung mi’? Pate, pang aaring lenmi, maa mi ut ia a kabina baa iaau waan paat kupi urin, baa ang kariaana a ngunungut u ra bung mi.
Tamaang, un wangaala paa a iaam!” Io, in ingaan raa taanginaanga u ra maawa i piri lenbi, “Iaau aa wangaala taai, ma ang wangaalai balet ut.”
A kor na taara baa diat tur matira diat walangoroi. Ma raa taara diat piri naa a pakpagur, ma raa taara kaai diat piri naa, “Raa aangelo maa i pirpir karomi.”
Iaku Iesu ut i piri naa, “In ingaai mi wakir i pirpir kupi in waraaut iaau, kupi in waraaut muaat ut.
A pakaana bung mi din naagagon a rakrakaan buaal, mi ut din lu wa a tadaaru i ra rakrakaan buaal.
Iaku iaau, baa din watur tato pa iaau taanga min napia unaanga nate, ang aal paa a taara raap karom iaau.”
I piri lenmi kupi in pir palaai naa in maat lelawaai.
Ma a kor na taara maa diat piri taana naa, “Miaat walangoroi ko ra Buk na Naagagon lenbi naa, Kaarisito in ki takum. Aawa kabina u piri naa din lo tato paa a Natu ra Muaana unaanga nate? Woi maa Natu ra Muaana?”
Iesu i piri taan diat naa, “A kaapa pa in ki iwan ma karom muaat. Muaat a waan taltalili baa a kaapa i ki utbaai karom muaat, namur a baboto in pulu baat muaat. Ia baa i waanwaan u ra baboto pa i nunurai naa in waan uwaai.
Baa a kaapa i ki utbaai karom muaat, muaat a nurnur uni, kupi muaat a kum natu ra kaapa.” Baa Iesu ia pir araap taa a pirpir mi, i waan ino paa kon diat.
Iesu ia paam taa mongoro na utnaa na kakaian namataandiat, iaku maa pa diat nurnur uni,
kupi a pirpir baa a propet Aaisaia i pirpir taau uni in waan paat lingtatuna. I piri lenbi, “Tadaaru, woi i nurnur u ra kum utnaa baa miaat piri? Ma woi maa di aa waiaa taa a dekdek i ra Tadaaru taana?”
Ma ia pir taai kaai lenbi, “God ia wapula baat wa a mataandiat, ma ia balbalaat baat wa a nuknukindiat, kupi koku diat babo ma ra mataandiat, ma koku diat nunura lelei u ra nuknukindiat, ma pa diat a tapuku karom iaau, kupi ang walaaun pa diat.” Bari ia a kabina baa pa diat nurnur.
Aaisaia i piri lenbi maa kabina ia babo muga wa a minamaar anun Iesu, ma i pirpir uni.
Ma mongoro na taara diat nurnur un Iesu. Raa kum mukmuga kaai ko ra taara Iudaia diat nurnur, iaku pa diat pirpir kaapa uni, kaduk a kum Parisaaio diat a turbaat wa diat ko ra kum ruma na lotu.
Diat baa diat nurnur pa diat pirpir kaapa uni kabina maa diat nem ku a pir walaawa anu ra taara karom diat, ma pa diat nuk paa a pir walaawa anun God karom diat.
Iesu i pirpir ma ra ina ngaala na ingaana lenbi, “Ia baa i nurnur un iaau, wakir i nurnur ku un iaau, i nurnur utkaai un ia baa i tula wa iaau urin.
Ma ia baa i babo iaau, ia babo taa ia baa i tula wa iaau urin.
Iaau aa waan paat urin u ra rakrakaan buaal welaar ma ra kaapa, kupi ia baa i nurnur un iaau, pa in ki u ra baboto.
Baa te i walangoro anung kum pirpir ma pa i murmuri, iaau pang naagagoni. Maa pa iaau waan paat kupi ang naagagon a rakrakaan buaal, iaau waan paat ku kupi ang walaauni.
Ia baa pa i nem iaau ma pa i taraam u ra nung kum pirpir, anung kum pirpir ut maa diat a naagagoni u ra tintinip na bung.
Maa a kum pirpir baa iaau aa pir tataai wakir anung, Tamaang ut i tula wa iaau mai urin kupi ang piri ma ang wewapua uni.
Ma iaau nunurai naa anuna wetulaa i taar a lalaaun takum. A kum utnaa iaau piri, Tamaang i tula wa iaau mai kupi ang piri.”
Baa ia marawaai a lukaara na waan likaai, Iesu i nunurai naa ia marawaai kupi in waan ma ko ra rakrakaan buaal, ma in waan karom Tamaana. I maari aakit anuna taara baa diat ki u ra rakrakaan buaal, ma mi i waiaa anuna ngaala na maarmaari karom diat, a maarmaari baa pa ta tuktukina.
U ra marum, Iesu ma ra nuna kum naat na wawer diat wangaan ungaai. Namuga taa ra nundiat winangaan, Saataan ia ruk taau un Iudaas Iskaariot, a natun Simon, kupi in wagu taa Iesu.
Iesu i nunurai naa Tamaana ia taar araap taa a dekdek karomi kupi in naagagon a kum utnaa raap mai, ma i nunurai naa i waan paa ut kon God, ma in waan talili balet karom God.
Io, i tur paa ko ra winangaan, i rakaan wa anuna raa ina maalu baa i burung baat anuna minong mai, i lo paa a taaol ma i do paai uni.
I labo paa a palaa u ra dis, ma i gi a kum kaki ra nuna kum naat na wawer mai, ma i upa magege diat ma ra taaol baa i do paai uni.
Baa i waan karom Simon Petero, Petero i piri taana naa, “Aai, Tadaaru, ui maa un gi a ru kaking?”
Iesu i baalui naa, “A utnaa mi iaau paami pa u nunurai, iaku namur un nunurai.”
Petero i piri naa, “Koku! Koku u gi a ru kaking.” Iesu i baalui naa, “Baa pang gi a ru kakim, ui wakir raa kon iaau.”
Simon Petero i baalui naa, “Tadaaru, baa un gi a ru kaking, koina baa un gi utkaai a ru limaang ma ra in loring!”
Iesu i piri taana naa, “Ia baa ia rariu paa, a panina raap ia gomgom, din gi taa maku a ru kakina. Muaat, muaat aa gomgom, iaku wakir muaat raap.”
Iesu ia nunura ia baa in wagu taai, maa ia a kabina baa i piri naa, “wakir muaat raap muaat gomgom.”
Baa ia gi taa a kum kakindiat, i ung paa balet anuna ina maalu baa i rakaan wai, i ki ma i tiri diat naa, “Muaat nunura ut a utnaa mi iaau paami un muaat?
Muaat waatung iaau baa ‘Tena Wawer’ ma ‘Tadaaru’. I takado ut anumuaat wawaatung, a iaang ut maa.
Iaau anumuaat Tadaaru ma Tena Wawer, iaau aa gi taa a kum kakimuaat, i koina kupi muaat kaai muaat a laana gi wetwetalaai a kum kakimuaat.
Iaau aa paam taa a walawalar mi karom muaat, i koina kupi muaat kaai muaat a paami lenmi iaau paami.
Iaau pir a lingtatuna taa muaat, a tultul pa i ngaala taa ra nuna tadaaru. Ma ia baa di tultulai pa i ngaala taan ia baa i wetulaa.
Baa muaat nunura a kum utnaa mi iaau pir taai taa muaat, ma muaat a paam diat, muaat a daan.
“Pa iaau pirpir un muaat raap, iaau nunura diat ut baa iaau pilak pa diat. Iaku din paam ot paa ut a utnaa baa di aa timu taai u ra Buk Taabu naa, ‘A muaana baa mir wangaan ungaai mai, in tapuku taau balet un iaau, ma in paa gulgul iaau.’
Iaau wapua muga ta muaat u ra utnaa mi baa in waan paat, kupi baa ia waan paat, muaat a nurnur baa iaau, iaau ut maa.
Iaau pir a lingtatuna taa muaat, baa te i gaaia paa te baa iaau tula wai, i gaaia pa iaau ut. Ma te baa i gaaia pa iaau, i gaaia pa ia utkaai baa i tula wa iaau urin.”
Baa Iesu ia pir taai lenmi, i kariaana a ngaala na mawaat u ra niono, ma i pir apuaanai naa, “Iaau pir a lingtatuna taa muaat, raa kon muaat in wagu ta iaau.”
A kum naat na wawer diat babo wetwetalaai diat, iaku pa diat nunurai naa woi kon diat maa i pir a pirpir mi uni.
Raa naat na wawer i ki marawaai taau karom Iesu. A naat na wawer mi Iesu i nemnem aakiti.
Simon Petero i pet kilang paa a naat na wawer maa kupi in tiri Iesu naa, “Woi kon daat maa i pir a pirpir mi uni?”
A naat na wawer maa i malaau karom Iesu ma i tiri naa, “Tadaaru, woi kon miaat maa u pir a pirpir maa uni?”
Iesu i baalui naa, “Ia baa ang puk paa a pakaana bred u ra dis ma ang taari taana, ia ut maa.” Io, i puk paa a pakaana bred, ma i taari karom Iudaas Iskaariot, natun Simon.
Baa Iudaas i rakaan paa a bred kon Iesu, Saataan i ruk taau maut u ra in balaana. Iesu i piri taan Iudaas naa, “A utnaa baa u nem na paami un paam gagaai.”
Iaku pa te kon diat baa diat ki ungaai u ra winangaan i nunurai naa aawa kabina baa Iesu i piri lenmaa karomi.
Kabina baa Iudaas i laana baboura anundiat maani, raa kum naat na wawer diat nuki naa Iesu i wapuai kupi in kul ta utnaa diat iba kupi u ra lukaara. Raa kum naat na wawer kaai diat nuki naa Iesu i wapuai kupi in tabaara a kum iba na taara ma ta utnaa.
Baa Iudaas ia rakaan paa a pakaana bred, i pari paa maut. Maa ia marum.
Baa Iudaas ia waan paa, Iesu i piri taan diat naa, “Mi din maar a Natu ra Muaana, ma God kaai in lo a minamaar uni.
Baa God in lo a minamaar uni, God kaai in taar a minamaar karom Natu ra Muaana. Mi God in taari taana.
“A kum teptepaang, mi pang ki iwan ma karom muaat. Muaat a baatbaat kup iaau. Welaar ma iaau aa pir taai taa ra kum te Iudaia, mi ang piri bulung taa muaat naa, ‘Pa muaat a waan laar paai u ra taamaan baa ang waan iaai.’
Mi iaau taar a matakina naagagon karom muaat naa, muaat a maari wetwetalaai muaat. Welaar ma iaau maari muaat, muaat kaai muaat a maari wetwetalaai muaat.
Baa muaat maari wetwetalaai muaat, a taara raap diat a nunurai naa muaat anung kum naat na wawer.”
Simon Petero i tiri naa, “Tadaaru, un waan uwaai?” Iesu i baalui naa, “A taamaan baa ang waan kupi, pa un waan laar paai iaai mi, iaku namur un murmur iaau.”
Petero i piri taana naa, “Tadaaru, aawa kabina baa pang murmur ui mi? Pa iaau burut baa ang maat un ui.”
Iesu i baalui naa, “Lelawaai, a lingtatuna ut maa u piri naa un maat un iaau? Iaau pir a lingtatuna taam, baa a kareke pa in kurkurekatuk utbaai, un weoro tula pakaan naa pa u nunura iaau.”
Iesu i piri taan diat naa, “Koku i laklagon a nuknukimuaat, muaat a nurnur un God, ma muaat a nurnur kaai un iaau.
Mongoro na kukur ra ruma u ra ruma anun Tamaang. Baa pate, ang wapua muaat utkaai uni. Io, mi ang waan kupi ang waninaar taa a pakaana kup muaat.
Baa iaau aa waninaar taa a pakaana kup muaat, ang waan talili balet, ma ang ben pa muaat karom iaau, kupi muaat kaai muaat a ki u ra taamaan baa iaau ki iaai.
Muaat nunura ut aakapi kup a taamaan baa ang waan kupi.”
Tomaas i piri taana naa, “Tadaaru, pa miaat nunura a taamaan baa un waan kupi, ma miaat a nunura lelawaai a aakapi kupi?”
Iesu i baalui naa, “Iaau a aakapi, ma iaau a lingtatuna, ma iaau a lalaaun. Pa te in waan karom Tamaang un ta aakapi ingen, un iaau ku.
Baa muaat nunura mulu iaau, muaat a nunura kaai Tamaang. Io, mi muaat aa nunurai, ma muaat aa baboi.”
Pilipo i piri taana naa, “Tadaaru, un waiaa taa Tamaam karom miaat, bi ku ia maa miaat nemi.”
Iesu i baalui naa, “Pilipo, iaau aa ki iwan ungaai ma muaat, ma pa u nunura iaau utbaai? Ia baa i babo iaau, ia babo taa Tamaang. Aawa kabina u piri naa ang waiaa taa Tamaang karom muaat?
Pa u nurnur naa iaau ki un Tamaang, ma Tamaang i ki un iaau? A kum pirpir baa iaau piri taa muaat, wakir anung. Tamaang baa i ki un iaau i paam anuna pinapaam.
Muaat a nurnur un iaau baa iaau piri naa iaau ki un Tamaang, ma Tamaang i ki un iaau. Baa pa muaat nurnur u ra nung pirpir, muaat a nurnur ku un iaau kabina u ra kum utnaa na kakaian baa iaau paami.
“Iaau pir a lingtatuna taa muaat, ia baa i nurnur un iaau, in paam a kum utnaa welaar ma iaau laana paami, ma in paam a kum ngaala na pinapaam taa ra kum pinapaam iaau aa paam taai, kabina maa ang waan karom Tamaang.
Ma a kum utnaa raap baa muaat aaringi u ra iaang, ang paam ot paai, kupi Tamaana in lo a minamaar un Natuna.
Baa muaat aaring kup ta utnaa u ra iaang, ang paam ot paai.
“Baa muaat maari iaau, muaat a taraam u ra nung kum wetulaa.
Ma ang aaring Tamaang, ma in tula wa bulung a Tena Wewaraaut karom muaat, kupi in ki takum karom muaat, a Takado na Nion, ia baa in wapuaana a lingtatuna.
A taara ko ra rakrakaan buaal pain diat a nemi, kabina pa diat a babo lelei ma pa diat a nunurai. Iaku muaat, muaat nunura a Tena Wewaraaut maa kabina i ki ungaai ma muaat ma in ki un muaat.
Baa ang waan kon muaat, pa muaat a ki na naat na walaa, ang waan talili balet ku karom muaat.
“Pa in welwelik ma, baa a taara ko ra rakrakaan buaal pa diat a babo iaau ma. Iaku muaat, muaat a babo iaau. Kabina baa iaau lalaaun, muaat kaai muaat a lalaaun.
Baa a bung maa in waan paat, muaat a nunurai naa iaau ki un Tamaang, ma muaat kaai muaat ki un iaau, ma iaau ki un muaat.
Ia baa i paam akoto anung kum wetulaa ma i taraam uni, ia maa i maari iaau. Ma Tamaang in maari, ma iaau kaai ang maari, ma ang waiaa iaau karomi.”
Iudaas (wakir Iudaas Iskaariot) i piri taan Iesu naa, “Tadaaru, aawa kabina baa un waiaa ta ui ku karom miaat, ma wakir karom a taara u ra rakrakaan buaal?”
Iesu i baalui naa, “Baa te i maari iaau, in taraam u ra nung kum wawer. Io, Tamaang in maari, ma mir ma Tamaang mir a waan karomi, ma mir a ki ungaai mai.
Ia baa pa i maari iaau, pa in taraam u ra nung kum wawer. Ma a kum pirpir baa muaat walangoroi wakir anung, anun Tamaang, ia baa i tula wa iaau urin.
“Iaau pir a kum utnaa mi taa muaat baa iaau ki utbaai karom muaat.
A Tena Wewaraaut, a Takado na Nion, baa Tamaang in tula wai u ra iaang, in wer muaat u ra kum utnaa raap, ma in wanuk taa balet a kum utnaa baa iaau aa pir taai taa muaat.
Iaau taar taa a maalmaal karom muaat, anung maalmaal maa iaau tabaara muaat mai. Pa iaau tabaara muaat welaar ma ra rakrakaan buaal i wetabaar. Koku i laklagon a nuknukimuaat, ma koku muaat burut.
Muaat aa walangoro taai baa iaau aa pir taai taa muaat naa, ‘Ang waan paa ma ang waan talili balet karom muaat.’ Baa muaat maari iaau, io, muaat a gaaia, maa ang waan karom Tamaang, maa ia i ngaala taang.
Iaau aa wapua amuga ta muaat u ra kum utnaa baa namur in waan paat, ma baa ia waan paat, muaat a nurnur.
“Pang pirpir liklik ma karom muaat, kabina a tadaaru i ra rakrakaan buaal marawaai ma in waan paat. Pa ta dekdekina kupi in uwia pa iaau mai,
iaku ang paam ot raap paa ut a kum utnaa baa Tamaang i tula wa iaau kupi ang paami, kupi a rakrakaan buaal in nunurai naa iaau maari Tamaang. Muaat tur ma daat a waan.”
Iesu i piri naa, “Iaau in diwaai na waain lingtatuna, ma Tamaang a tena baboura u ra wanua na waain.
I bur kutu wa a kum gagagaang baa pa diat wa, ma i wagomgom diat baa diat wa, kupi diat a wa mongmongoro na waindiat.
Muaat aa gomgom kabina u ra pirpir baa iaau aa pir taai taa muaat.
Muaat a lalaaun un iaau, ma iaau ang lalaaun un muaat. Welaar ma ra gagaana waain pa in wa biaa ku baa pa i paraap u ra in diwaaina, lenkaai maa karom muaat, pa muaat a wa baa pa muaat lalaaun un iaau.
“Iaau ut in diwaai na waain, ma muaat a kum gagagaang. Ia baa i lalaaun un iaau, ma iaau lalaaun uni, in wa mongoro na waina. Iaku baa muaat lalaaun ingen kon iaau, pa muaat a pet laar paa ta utnaa.
Baa te pa i lalaaun un iaau, in welaar ma ra kum maraang na gagaana diwaai, baa din ong wa diat. Din ung ungaai diat, ma din ong ta diat u ra nguan, kupi diat a kupkup matira.
Baa muaat lalaaun un iaau, ma anung pirpir in lalaaun un muaat, io, baa muaat a aaring iaau kup ta utnaa muaat nemi, din taari ut taa muaat.
“Tamaang in lo a minamaar baa muaat wa mongoro na waimuaat, ma a waimuaat in waiaai naa muaat anung kum naat na wawer lingtatuna.
Welaar ma Tamaang i maari iaau, iaau kaai iaau maari muaat. Muaat a lalaaun u ra nung maarmaari.
Baa muaat taraam u ra nung kum wetulaa, muaat a lalaaun u ra nung maarmaari, welaar ma iaau, iaau taraam u ra kum wetulaa anun Tamaang, ma iaau lalaaun u ra nuna maarmaari.
“Iaau pir a kum pirpir mi taa muaat, kupi anung gaaia in ki un muaat, ma anumuaat gaaia in teng u ra numuaat lalaaun.
Bi ia anung wetulaa karom muaat naa, muaat a maari wetwetalaai muaat, welaar ma iaau maari muaat.
Baa te i ung wa anuna lalaaun kupi in maat u ra kum teptepaana, anuna maarmaari i ngaala aakit. Pa ta maarmaari anun te i welaar mai.
Io, muaat a kum teptepaang baa muaat taraam u ra nung kum wetulaa.
Pang waatung muaat balet ma naa a kum tultul, maa a tultul pa i nunura a utnaa baa anuna tadaaru i paami. Iaku iaau waatung muaat naa a kum teptepaang, maa iaau aa pir araap taa a kum utnaa taa muaat baa iaau walangoroi kon Tamaang.
Wakir muaat pilak pa iaau, iaau ut iaau pilak pa muaat. Ma iaau tula wa muaat kupi muaat a waan ma muaat a wa a waimuaat, ma a waimuaat in ki takum. Ma Tamaang in tabaara muaat ma ra kum utnaa raap muaat aaring kupi u ra iaang.
Muaat a maari wetwetalaai muaat. Bi ia anung wetulaa karom muaat.
“Baa a taara ko ra rakrakaan buaal diat a milikuaana muaat, muaat a nuk paai baa diat aa milikuaana muga ta iaau.
Baa muaat anu ra rakrakaan buaal, io, a rakrakaan buaal in maari muaat welaar ma muaat anuna. Iaku muaat wakir anu ra rakrakaan buaal, maa iaau aa pilak pa muaat koni. Bi ia a kabina baa i milikuaana muaat.
Muaat a nuk paa a pirpir baa iaau aa pir taai taa muaat lenbi, ‘A tultul pa i ngaala taa ra nuna tadaaru.’ Baa diat baanaakaka iaau, diat a baanaakaka muaat kaai. Baa diat taraam u ra nung pirpir, diat a taraam kaai u ra numuaat pirpir.
Diat a baanaakaka muaat kabina u ra iaang, maa pa diat nunura ia baa i tula wa iaau urin.
“Baa gun pang waan paat ma pang pirpir karom diat, io, pa din takuna diat u ra nundiat kum aakaina mangamangaan, ma diat a laangalaanga. Iaku mi, pa nundiat ta pirpir kupi diat a pir baat diat mai ko ra nundiat aakaina mangamangaan.
Ia baa i milikuaana iaau, i milikuaana utkaai Tamaang.
Baa gun pa iaau paam taa a kum utnaa na kakaian naan diat baa pain te in paam laar paai, pa din takuna diat u ra nundiat kum aakaina mangamangaan ma diat a laangalaanga. Ma mi, diat aa babo taa a kum utnaa na kakaian baa iaau paami, iaku diat milikuaana ut mir raap ma Tamaang.
Di paami lenmi, kupi din paam ot paa a pirpir di aa timu taai u ra Buk na Naagagon baa, ‘Diat milikuaana iaau, ma pa ta kabina.’
“Ang tula wa a Tena Wewaraaut karom muaat kon Tamaang, ia a Takado na Nion baa in wapuaana a lingtatuna. Baa in waan paat in wewapua un iaau.
Ma muaat kaai muaat a wewapua un iaau, kabina muaat ki ungaai ma iaau ko ra turturpaai ra nung pinapaam tuk mi.
“Iaau pir a kum utnaa mi taa muaat kupi koku anumuaat nurnur in puka.
Diat a turbaat muaat ko ra kum ruma na lotu. Namur a pakaana bung in waan paat, baa diat baa diat aak doko muaat, diat a nuki naa diat paam ut a pinapaam anun God.
A taara diat a paam a kum utnaa mi karom muaat, kabina maa pa diat nunura mir ma Tamaang.
Iaau pir taa a kum utnaa mi taa muaat, kupi baa a pakaana bung maa in waan paat, muaat a nunurai naa iaau aa wakatom muga ta muaat uni. “Pa iaau pir a kum utnaa mi taa muaat u ra turturpaai ra nung pinapaam, kabina maa iaau ki ungaai utbaai ma muaat.
Io mi, ang waan karom ia baa i tula wa iaau urin. Iaku maa pa te kon muaat i tiri iaau naa, ‘Un waan uwaai?’
Muaat tapunuk aakit baa iaau pir a kum utnaa mi taa muaat.
Iaau pir a lingtatuna taa muaat naa, in koina karom muaat baa ang waan. Baa pang waan, a Tena Wewaraaut pa in waan paat karom muaat. Iaku baa ang waan, io, ang tula wai urin karom muaat.
“Io, baa in waan paat, in waiaa a taara u ra rakrakaan buaal naa pa diat nunura lele a mangamangaan aakaina, ma ra mangamangaan na takado ma ra naagagon anun God.
In waiaa diat naa baa pa diat nurnur un iaau, bi ia anundiat aakaina mangamangaan.
Ma in waiaa diat kaai naa iaau ut a kabi ra takado na mangamangaan, maa ang waan karom Tamaang ma pa muaat a babo iaau balet ma.
Ma in waiaa diat kaai naa God ia naagagon taa a tadaaru i ra rakrakaan buaal, ma ia uwia paai.
“Mongoro na utnaa baa ang piri taa muaat, iaku pa i tale muaat utbaai kupi muaat a nunura lelei.
Baa a Takado na Nion baa i wapuaana a lingtatuna in waan paat, in wakaapa muaat u ra kum lingtatuna raap un God. Maa a kum pirpir baa in piri wakir anuna, in pir ku a kum pirpir baa i walangoroi, ma in wapua muaat u ra kum utnaa baa in waan paat namur.
In taar a minamaar karom iaau, baa i lolo paa anung pirpir, ma in wapua muaat uni.
A kum utnaa raap baa anun Tamaang, anung, maa ia kabina baa iaau piri naa a Takado na Nion in lolo paa anung pirpir ma in wapua muaat uni.
“Pa in iwan ku, ma pa muaat a babo iaau ma. Ma pa in iwan balet ku, muaat a babo iaau balet.”
Anuna raa kum naat na wawer diat tiri wetwetalaai diat naa, “Aawa kukuraai ra nuna pirpir mi baa i piri naa, pa in iwan ku ma pa daat a baboi ma, ma pa in iwan balet ku daat a baboi balet? Ma i piri kaai lenbi, ‘Kabina ang waan karom Tamaang’.
Aawa kukuraaina maa i piri naa ‘pa in iwan’? Pa daat nunura a utnaa mi i pirpir uni!”
Iesu i nunurai naa diat nem na tiri, io, i piri karom diat, “Iaau piri naa, ‘Pa in iwan ku baa pa muaat a babo iaau ma, ma pa in iwan balet ku muaat a babo iaau balet.’ Mi ia a pirpir baa muaat tiri wetwetalaai muaat uni?
Iaau pir a lingtatuna taa muaat, muaat a tapunuk ma muaat a taangi, iaku a rakrakaan buaal in gaaia. Muaat a tapunuk, iaku namur din kiaana anumuaat tapunuk ma ra gaaia.
A tabuan baa i marawaai kupi in babuta, i tapunuk kabina maa i kariaana a ngunungut. Iaku, baa ia babuta paa, i gaaia, maa ia buta taa a naat urin u ra rakrakaan buaal, ma anuna tapunuk i raap.
Lenkaai maa karom muaat, mi muaat tapunuk, iaku ang babo muaat balet, ma muaat a gaaia. A mangaana gaaia mi, pa te in pet laar paai kupi in rakaan wai kon muaat.
“U ra bung maa, pa muaat a tiri iaau balet ma un ta utnaa. Iaau pir a lingtatuna taa muaat, Tamaang in tabaara muaat ma ra kum utnaa baa muaat aaringi koni u ra iaang.
Tuk mi, pa muaat aaring utbaai kup ta utnaa u ra iaang. Iaku namur muaat a aaraaring ma din tabaara muaat, kupi anumuaat gaaia in teng u ra numuaat lalaaun.
“Iaau pir a kum utnaa mi taa muaat u ra kum pirpir welwelaar, iaku a pakaana bung in waan paat baa pang pirpir balet ma karom muaat ma ra pirpir welwelaar, ang wapua kaapa mulu muaat ma un Tamaang.
U ra kum bungbung maa, muaat a aaraaring u ra iaang. Pa iaau piri naa ang aaring Tamaang kupi in waraaut muaat,
maa Tamaang ut i maari muaat. I maari muaat kabina muaat maari iaau, ma muaat nurnur baa iaau waan paat kon God.
Iaau aa waan paa kon Tamaang, ma iaau waan urin u ra rakrakaan buaal. Ma mi, ang waan ma ko ra rakrakaan buaal, ang waan balet kup Tamaang.”
Anuna kum naat na wawer diat piri taana naa, “Mi pa u pirpir ma ma ra pirpir welwelaar, u pirpir kaapa mulu maraagaam.
Mi miaat nunurai naa u nunura a kum utnaa raap. Pa u iba kup te in tiri ui ma ta wetiri, maa u aa nunura a nuknukimiaat raap. Mi miaat nurnur maraagaam baa u waan paa ut kon God.”
Iesu i piri taan diat naa, “Ni, muaat nurnur maraagaam?
A pakaana bung in waan paat, ma mi ia waan paat, baa din lu werweraana wa muaat kon iaau, ma muaat a waan werweraan kup anumuaat kum taamtaamaan, ma iaau maku ang ki. Iaku wakir iaau ku maa ang ki, mir ut ma Tamaang.
“Iaau pir a kum pirpir mi taa muaat kupi muaat a lalaaun un iaau, ma muaat a paam akoto a maalmaal. Main u ra rakrakaan buaal, muaat a kariaana a mawaat. Iaku koku muaat burut, maa iaau aa uwia paa a rakrakaan buaal.”
Baa Iesu ia pir araap wa a kum pirpir mi, i babo tato unaanga u ra maawa, ma i piri naa, “Tamaang, a pakaana bung ia waan paat, un taar a minamaar karom Natum, kupi Natum in taar a minamaar karom ui.
U taar taa a naagagon taang kup a taara raap, kupi ang taar a lalaaun takum karom diat raap baa u taar ta diat taang.
Bi ia a lalaaun takum baa a taara diat a nunura ui, baa ui ku a God lingtatuna, ma diat a nunura kaai Iesu Kaarisito, baa u tula wai urin.
Iaau aa waiaa taa a minamaarim min u ra rakrakaan buaal, baa iaau paam ot paa a kum pinapaam baa u tula wa iaau mai kupi ang paami.
Tamaang, mi un taar a minamaar taang, baa ang ki ungaai balet ma ui. A minamaar maa namuga iaau ki uni ungaai ma ui, baa pa di waki utbaai a rakrakaan buaal.
“Diat baa u aa pilak pa diat ko ra rakrakaan buaal, ma u taar ta diat taang, iaau aa pir waiaa ta ui taan diat. Diat anum ma u taar ta diat taang, ma diat aa taraam u ra num kum pirpir.
Mi diat aa nunurai naa a kum pirpir raap u taar taai taang, i waan paat lingtatuna paa ut kon ui.
Iaau aa wapua ta diat u ra kum pirpir u taar taai taang, ma diat aa taraam uni. Ma diat nunurai naa iaau waan paa ut kon ui, ma diat aa nurnur baa ui ut u tula wa iaau urin.
“Mi iaau aaraaring un diat. Wakir iaau aaraaring u ra taara ko ra rakrakaan buaal, iaku iaau aaraaring un diat baa u taar ta diat taang, kabina maa diat anum.
Diat baa anung, diat anum utkaai, ma diat baa anum, diat anung utkaai. Ma din babo anung minamaar un diat.
Mi ang waan karom ui, pang ki iwan balet ma u ra rakrakaan buaal, iaku diat, kuri utbaai diat u ra rakrakaan buaal. Tamaang u gomgom aakit, un baboura baat diat ma ra dekdek i ra iaam, a iaam baa u taar taai taang, kupi diat a raa ku, welaar ma ui ma iaau, daar raa ku.
Baa iaau ki ungaai ma diat, iaau baboura baat diat ma ra dekdek i ra iaam, a iaam baa u taar taai taang. Iaau baboura baat diat, ma pa te kon diat i wirua. Raa ot ku in wirua, Iudaas, ia baa a natu ra winirua takum. Lenmaa, a pirpir di aa timu taai u ra Buk Taabu in waan paat lingtatuna.
“Mi ang waan karom ui, iaku iaau pir a kum pirpir mi baa iaau ki utbaai main u ra rakrakaan buaal, kupi anung ngaala na gaaia in wateng anundiat lalaaun.
Iaau aa pir taa anum kum pirpir taan diat, ma a rakrakaan buaal i milikuaana diat, kabina wakir balet ma diat taanga min u ra rakrakaan buaal, welaar ma iaau kaai, wakir iaau taanga min u ra rakrakaan buaal.
Pa iaau aaring ui kupi un rakaan wa diat ko ra rakrakaan buaal, pate. Iaku iaau aaring ui kupi un baboura baat diat ko ra Tena Aakaina.
Wakir iaau taanga min u ra rakrakaan buaal, io, diat kaai wakir diat taanga min u ra rakrakaan buaal.
Anum pirpir i lingtatuna. Un wagomgom diat ma ra num lingtatuna na pirpir kupi diat anum taara mulu.
Welaar ma u tula wa iaau urin u ra rakrakaan buaal, lenkaai maa iaau tula wa diat u ra rakrakaan buaal.
Iaau taar ta iaau taam, kupi diat kaai diat a gomgom ma ra num lingtatuna na pirpir kupi diat anum taara mulu.
“Wakir iaau aaraaring ku un diat, iaau aaraaring utkaai un diat baa namur diat a nurnur un iaau, baa a kum tena nurnur diat a wewapua un iaau.
Iaau aaraaring baa diat raap baa diat nurnur un iaau, diat a raa ku. Tamaang, welaar ma u ki un iaau ma iaau ki un ui, i koina baa diat ma daar, daat a raa ku, kupi a taara u ra rakrakaan buaal diat a nurnur naa u tula wa iaau urin.
Iaau taar taa a minamaar taan diat, a minamaar baa u taar taai taang, kupi diat a raa ku, welaar ma daar, daar raa ku.
Iaau ki un diat, ma ui kaai u ki un iaau, kupi diat a raa maku, kupi a taara u ra rakrakaan buaal diat a nunurai kaai naa u tula wa iaau urin, ma diat a nunurai naa u maari diat welaar ma u maari iaau.
“Tamaang, iaau nemi naa diat baa u aa taar ta diat taang, diat a ki ungaai ma iaau u ra taamaan baa ang ki iaai, kupi diat a babo anung minamaar, a minamaar u taar taai taang, kabina u maari iaau namuga utbaai baa pa di waki utbaai a rakrakaan buaal.
Tamaang, ui a Tena Takado, a taara u ra rakrakaan buaal pa diat nunura ui, iaku iaau, iaau nunura ui, ma anung taara na wawer diat nunurai naa u tula wa iaau urin.
Iaau aa pir waiaa ta ui karom diat, ma pang ngo ma ra wewapua karom diat, kupi diat a nunura ui, ma a maarmaari baa u maari iaau mai, in ki karom diat ma iaau ang ki un diat.”
Baa Iesu ia aaraaring paa, i ben paa anuna kum naat na wawer, ma diat waan bolo u ra naat na daanim Kedron. Baa diat waan bolo, diat waan ruk un raa wanua na diwaai na oliwa.
Iudaas, ia baa i wagu taa Iesu, i nunura a wanua maa, kabina mongoro na pakaan Iesu ma ra nuna kum naat na wawer diat laana waan ungaai iaai.
Io, Iudaas i muga paa a kum tena wineium anu ra taara Rom, ma ra kum tena baboura ko ra ruma na wetabaar. A kum ngaala na tena wetabaar ma ra kum Parisaaio diat tula wa diat. Diat lo a kum utnaa na wineium, a kum laam ma ra kum utnaa baa i kup baa diat ulu aara diat mai.
Iaku Iesu ia nunura a kum utnaa raap baa in waan paat karomi, io, i waan karom diat ma i tiri diat naa, “Woi maa muaat baat kupi?”
Diat baalui naa, “Iesu a te Naasaret.” Iesu i piri naa, “Mi ut iaau.” Ma Iudaas, a tena wawagu kuraa ut i tur ungaai ma diat.
Baa Iesu i wapua diat naa, “Mi ut iaau,” diat ki wewa unamur, ma diat katuk unapia.
Iesu i tiri diat balet naa, “Woi maa muaat baat kupi?” Diat baalui naa, “Iesu a te Naasaret.”
Iesu i baalu diat naa, “Iaau aa pir taai taa muaat naa, mi ut iaau. Baa muaat baat ut kup iaau, io, muaat a maadek wa diat bi diat a waan.”
Baa Iesu i piri lenmi di paam ot paa a pirpir baa ia pir taai naa, “Tamaang, diat raap baa u taar ta diat taang, pa te kon diat i wirua.”
Simon Petero i lo ut anuna in liwan na wineium. I aalum paai ma i pakaat kutu wa ina ot na talingaan Maalko. Maalko, ia raa tultul anu ra mukmuga na tena wetabaar karom God.
Iesu i piri taan Petero naa, “Waruk balet anum in liwan u ra baana. Lelawaai, pang paam ot paa a pinapaam baa Tamaang i taar taai taang?”
A kum tena wineium taangirong Rom ungaai ma ra nundiat mukmuga, ma ra kum tena baboura ko ra ruma na wetabaar anu ra taara Iudaia, diat paam akoto paa Iesu, ma diat wi paa a ru limaana.
Ma diat ben mugai karom Aanaas, ia baa diaar nimuna ma Kaaiapaas, a mukmuga na tena wetabaar karom God u ra kilaala maa.
Kaaiapaas, ia baa i piri karom a kum te Iudaia naa i koina baa te in maat baat a taara raap.
Simon Petero ma raa naat na wawer kaai diaar murmur Iesu. Ma a mukmuga na tena wetabaar i nunura wakaak a naat na wawer baa diaar weur ma Petero. A naat maa i ruk ungaai ma Iesu unaanga u ra pakaana anu ra tena wetabaar maa.
Petero kuraa utbaai i turtur nataamaan naa ra bonanaaka. Io, a naat na wawer baa a mukmuga i nunurai, i waan talili balet, ma i pirpir karom a tauraara baa i baboura a bonanaaka, kupi in paapa aara paa Petero.
A tauraara baa i baboura a bonanaaka i tiri Petero naa, “Aai, ui kaai raa naat na wawer anu ra muaana mi, ni?” Petero i baalui naa, “Pate, iaau pate.”
A bung na marum maa i madiring aakit. Io, a kum tultul ma ra kum tena baboura ko ra ruma na wetabaar diat wakaa paa a nguan, diat tur lili paai ma diat maniri. Petero kaai i tur ungaai ma diat ma i manir.
Aanaas, a mukmuga na tena wetabaar karom God i tiri Iesu u ra nuna kum naat na wawer, ma u ra kum wawer i wer a taara uni.
Iesu i baalui naa, “Iaau aa pipipir kaapa namataa ra taara raap, ma iaau laana wer diat u ra kum ruma na lotu ma u ra ruma na wetabaar baa a taara Iudaia diat laana waan ungaai iaai. Pa iaau wapua ino ta diat un ta utnaa.
Aawa kabina baa u tiri iaau? Un tiri a taara baa diat laana walangoro iaau. Diat maa, diat nunura a kum utnaa baa iaau pipipir uni.”
Baa Iesu ia pir taai lenmaa, raa ko ra kum tena baboura i paar a mataana, ma i piri taana naa, “Aawa kabina baa u baalu a pirpir anu ra mukmuga na tena wetabaar lenmaa?”
Iesu i baalui naa, “Baa iaau aa waatung taa ta utnaa i raara, un pir akaapai karom a taara raap bi. Iaku baa a utnaa mi iaau piri i lingtatuna ut, aawa kabina baa u paar a mataang?”
Baa pa te utbaai i palaa a winiwi ko ra ru limaana, Aanaas i tula wai karom Kaaiapaas, ia kaai a mukmuga na tena wetabaar karom God.
Baa Petero kuraa utbaai i manmanir, diat tiri naa, “Aai, ui kaai raa ko ra nuna kum naat na wawer, ni?” Petero i weoro, i piri naa, “Pate, iaau pate.”
Raa tultul anu ra mukmuga na tena wetabaar, a kakun ia baa Petero i pakaat kutu wa in talingaana, i piri naa, “Naapi ui ut duk, maa iaau babo ungaai ta mur ma Iesu inaanga u ra wanua na diwaai na oliwa?”
Petero i weoro balet naa, “Pate.” U ra pakaana bung ut maa, a kareke i kurkurekatuk.
U ra malaana kinalik, di ben paa Iesu ko ra ruma anun Kaaiapaas kup a ngaala na ruma anun Pilaato, raa mukmuga ko ra mataanitu Rom. A kum te Iudaia pa diat nem na ruk u ra nuna ruma, maa diat aa wagomgom pa diat kupi diat a wangaan u ra lukaara na waan likaai. Maa i taabu baa diat a ruk karom te baa wakir a te Iudaia.
Io, Pilaato i pari karom diat ma i tiri diat naa, “Aawa maa muaat takuna a muaana mi uni?”
Ma diat baalui naa, “Baa a muaana mi pa i paam ta niraara, pain miaat a taar taai taam kupi un naagagoni.”
Pilaato i piri karom diat naa, “Muaat a ben paai, ma muaat ut muaat a naagagoni welaar ma anumuaat naagagon.” A kum te Iudaia diat piri taana naa, “Pa miaat paam akoto a naagagon kupi miaat a aak doko te.”
A utnaa mi i waan paat kupi din paam ot paa a pirpir anun Iesu, baa ia pir muga taai u ra nuna minaat.
Io, namur Pilaato i ruk balet, ma i wataa paa Iesu, ma i tiri naa, “Ui maa a king anu ra taara Iudaia?”
Iesu i baalui balet ku ma ra wetiri naa, “Lelawaai, ui ut u waatung iaau lenmaa, baa diat wapua ta ui ku un iaau?”
